loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es:
Don pedro sigue con su trabajo en su taller de mecanica, queriendo hacer nuevas proyecciones en este año, para una mejor administracion, y asi obtener mejores bebeficios junto a su familia,
Su esposa lo apoya con una pulperia, en donde cubre los gastos basicos del hogar, siempre dando el apoyo a sus tres hijos menores con el estudio. Don Pedro hoy con esta nueva solicitud hara una pequeña oficina y bodega, en su taller logrando mejor espacio para los vehiculo como poder ordenarse mejor. Comprara materiales de construccion para comenzar la obra.
texts.en:
Pedro continues with his auto mechanic shop wanting to make new projects for this year for better administration and to obtain better benefits for his family.

His wife helps him out with a grocery store which covers basic household expenses and supporting their three minor children with their schooling.  

With this new loan request, Pedro will build a small office and storeroom in his shop thus obtaining better space for the vehicles to be able to organize himself better.  He will buy building materials and supplies to start the project.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies to build an office and a storeroom.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase merchandise, thread, needles and cloth

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
La señora Antonia tiene 49 años de edad, soltera por viudez, tiene 7 hijos todos están casados, ella vive en la comunidad de Rio Blanquito, Choloma, Cortes, sola con su padre.
Doña Antonia es muy trabajadora, para obtener ingresos realiza varias actividades de negocio la principal es la elaboración y venta de nacatamales (son hechos de harina de maíz, rellenos de carne, papas, aceitunas, chicharos y arroz y envueltos en hoja de guineo), otra es la venta de ropa y sandalias, además vende agua a sus vecinos ya que ella tiene un pozo y en la comunidad hay problemas de agua pues ella recibe otros ingresos de allí. También tiene un apartamento que lo alquila. 
Es el segundo préstamo solicitado a ODEF y lo necesita para comprar ropa nueva y sandalias. Su plan es tener siempre productos para la venta.
texts.en:
Antonia, age 49, is single because she is a widow.  She has seven children, and they are all married.  She lives alone with her father in the Rio Blanquito community in Choloma, Cortes.

Antonia is a very hard-worker.  In order to get income she does several business activities.  The main one is making and selling “nacatamales” (They are made with corn flour and filled with meat, potatoes, olives, peas, and rice.  They are wrapped in a banana leaf).

She also sells clothing and sandals.  In addition to this she sells water to her neighbors because she has a well.  The community has problems with water, and she gets other income from the well.  She also has an apartment that she rents out.

This is the second loan that she has requested from ODEF.  She needs it to buy new clothes and sandals.  Her plan is to always have products to sell.

loans.use: to buy new clothes and sandals to sell.

loans.name: Angela Fernanda

texts.es:
Ángela es una mujer soltera de 29 años. Tras la muerte de su madre, se quedó sola y vive en la parroquia de Eloy Alfaro de Latacunga que es una ciudad de Ecuador, capital de la provincia de Cotopaxi y cabecera cantonal del cantón homónimo. Se encuentra en la Sierra centro del país, en las estribaciones de la cordillera de los Andes en Ecuador. Se encuentra a 2750 metros sobre el nivel del mar y tiene una temperatura promedio de 12 grados centígrados.

Es una ciudad que en la primera y segunda década del siglo XXI  ha demostrado un desarrollo sostenido que la ha colocado entre las ciudades más importantes de la sierra ecuatoriana en la actualidad. Todos los atributos históricos, arquitectónicos y culturales que posee Latacunga le han permitido ser considerada como Ciudad Patrimonial de la Nación.


Tras la muerte de su madre, Ángela tomó la posta en el negocio al que ella se dedicaba que es el de venta de caramelos y confites dentro de una universidad de la ciudad. El negocio ya tiene 17 años de funcionamiento. Ángela quiere invertir comprando lotes de productos y así obtener mejores precios de sus proveedores y así tener mayores ganancias. Por esta razón Ángela necesita un crédito con el cual podrá hacer realidad su inversión.

Esta mujer es estilista de profesión sin embargo no la ejerce. Ella quisiera en un futuro tener su propio "salón de belleza". Esperamos que tras esta inversión ella pueda estar más cerca de sus sueños y anhelos
texts.en:
Ángela is a 29 year old single woman. Since the death of her mother she has been on her own and lives in the Eloy Alfaro parish of Latacunga, which is a city in Ecuador. The capital of Cotopaxi Province and administrative center for Homónimo Cantón, it is in the mountainous center of the country, the foothills of the Andes in Ecuador. The city is 2750 meters above sea level and has an average temperature of 12 degrees Centigrade. In the last twenty years the city has shown sustained development which has placed it among the most important cities of the equatorial mountains today. Its historical, architectural, and cultural attributes have led to Latacunga being recognized as a National Heritage City.

After the death of her mother, Ángela took over her post in the business she runs, which is selling candies and sweets at a university in the city. The business has been in operation for 17 years. Ángela wants to invest in bulk product purchases so she can get better prices from her sources and so make a larger profit. For this reason, Ángela needs a loan with which she can make this investment a reality. 

This woman is a stylist by profession, however she does not practice this. In the future she would like to have her own beauty salon. She hopes that with this investment she can move closer to her dreams and aspirations.

loans.use: to purchase sweets in bulk at a better price

loans.name: Raquel De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Doña Raquel,  tiene su pequeño negocio de librería en su casa de habitacion, su esposo laborando como conductor, dando el apoyo moral y economico a su dos hijos estudiante de secundaria.
Como objetivo es crecer, en su negocio, asi como hacer las mejora a su casa, es por tal razon hara un muro, dando mejor seguridad,  a su propiedad y a su familia, el cual comprara materiales de construccion y comenzar la obra.
texts.en: Doña Raquel has her small paper goods business in her home. Her husband works as a driver, giving moral and economic support to their two children who are students in secondary school. Her goal is to grow her business as well as to improve her house. Therefore she will build a wall, to give greater security to her property and her family. With the loan she will purchase construction materials and begin the work.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to make a wall safeguarding her property

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es: Eduardo, de 55 años, es un hombre muy trabajador, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposa Margarita de 52 años y sus 04 queridos hijos; a quienes desea brindar una buena educación. Eduardo a su edad es un hombre centrado en sus responsabilidades y obligaciones, la vida le enseño tropiezos pero no se rinde ante eso. hoy trata de sobresalir con sus plantas de cacao, los cuales después de cosecharlos los lleva a vender a la ciudad de San Francisco, en donde ya tiene diversos compradores, que sabiendo de la calidad de su producto no dudan en esperarlo para comprarle todos sus cultivos al por mayor. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y hacerlas fértiles y productivasl. Lleva 26 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es fumigar sus chacras de las plagas, ya que tiene que hacerlo con mucho cuidado por que los productos químicos pueden hacer daño su salud. El crédito solicitado es para el mantenimiento de sus cultivos. En adelante, espera seguir ahorrando sus ingresos por que desea comprar nuevas tierras. Este será su primer crédito con MFP,  sabe que el dinero del crédito le será muy beneficioso para el desarrollo de su trabajo. Se siente contento por pertenecer al grupo de socios de su banco comunal. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles; contratará jornaleros para que  lo apoyen en el mantenimiento respectivo de sus cultivos como: la poda, el desmonte de maleza y la fumigación.
texts.en:
Eduardo is 55 years old and is a very hardworking man.  He lives in his own house with his wife, Margarita (52 years old) and their 4 beloved children, whom he wants to provide with a good education.  At his age Eduardo is a man who focuses on his responsibilities and obligations, and though he has gotten used to setbacks in life, he doesn’t let them stop him.  He is currently trying to get ahead with his cacao plants; after harvesting them he goes to sell the cacao in the city of San Francisco.  He already has different buyers there who know the quality of his product and are eager to purchase all of his cacao wholesale.  What Eduardo likes most about his work is planting the crops on his land and making the land fertile and productive.  He has worked in this activity for 26 years, and what he finds most difficult about it is spraying his fields for pests, since he has to do that with great care because the chemicals can be dangerous to his health.  

The loan Eduardo is asking for will be used to maintain his crops.  In the future he hopes to continue saving his income because he wants to buy more land.  This will be his first loan with MFP, and he knows that the money from the loan will be very helpful for improving his work.  He is happy to belong to his communal bank with the other members of his group.  Eduardo is going to use the 1,500 soles from the loan to hire day laborers to help him with specific maintenance tasks such as pruning, removing weeds, and spraying his crops.

loans.use: to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de golosinas,ella vende chupetes,chicles,galletas y gaseosas,ella vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,por medio de este pequeño negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,el sueño de la socia es tener un tienda de abarrotes.La socia solicita el credito para comprar galletas,caramelos,gaseosas y chupetes al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Gregoria continues working in her business of selling candy.  She sells lollipops, gum, cookies, and soft drinks.  She sells in an itinerant manner from 8:00 a.m. until 6:00 p.m.  It is through this small business that she gets her children ahead.

Her dream is to have a grocery store.

She is requesting the loan to buy cookies, candy, soft drinks, and lollipops wholesale.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy cookies, candy, soft drinks, and lollipops wholesale.

loans.name: Edwin

texts.es: Edwin, de 31 años de edad, convive con Enayda de 22  años de edad y juntos viven en su propia casa con sus 02 hijos Juan de 05 años y Ruth de 06 meses. La labor que realiza Edwin es labrar la tierra, donde cultiva plantas de cacao. Sus padres le enseñaron  a remover la tierra y con sus ahorros acumulados pudo concretar sus ansias de contar con su propia parcela. Es conocedor del arduo trabajo en el campo; donde viene trabajando 10 años en sus propias tierras, en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros quienes se encargan de trasladar los productos cosechados hasta cierto tramo; para luego ser  comercializados. Se siente muy comprometido con su trabajo; porque gracias a su esfuerzo cotidiano hoy disfruta al ver que sus plantas dan un buen fruto. Cuenta que la  estación de invierno no es de su agrado porque son meses donde abundan mayor cantidad de insectos perjudicando a sus sembríos. El crédito solicitado es para la compra de plantas de cacao para luego injertarlos y sacar buen provecho de sus frutos en menor tiempo. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podrá acceder a otro préstamo con mayor tranquilidad y sin traerle complicaciones a su banco comunal. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles; comprará plantas de cacao para luego injertarlos y sacar buen beneficio de sus frutos.
texts.en:
Edwin, age 31, lives with 22 year old Enayda.  They live in their own house with their two children, five year old Juan and six month old Ruth.  Edwin works the land where he grows cacao.  His parents taught him how to till the land.  With his accumulated savings he was able to achieve his goal of having his own land.  

He knows about hard work in the field, where he has been working his own land for ten years.  During harvest time he is helped by hired field hands who transport the harvested products to a certain point to be sold. He feels very committed to his work because, thanks to his daily efforts, today he enjoys seeing that his plants bear good fruit.  He comments that he’s not very fond of winter because insects that damage his crops are abundant during those months.

He will use the requested 1,000 soles to buy cocoa bean plants to graft and get profits from them in a shorter time.

This will be his first loan with MFP. He knows that if he repays it on time he’ll be able to access another loan more easily and not create problems for his communal bank.

loans.use: to buy cacao plants.

loans.name: Maria Mercedes

texts.es: Maria Mercedes tiene 45 años de edad, su negocio a la que se dedica es a la venta de mercadería en general, esta actividad la realiza de forma ambulante desde hace varios años en cual esta experiencia le ayuda a ella que sus clientes la visiten mas por la calidad de ropa que le ofrece el servicio. Maria Mercedes es una emprendedora que sin tener conocimientos del negocio se arriesga pero lo inicia con capital propio y hoy en día se considera vencedora ya que a pesar de que no sabía se arriesgo donde no todos tiene esa actitud de arriesgarse. Actualmente la emprendedora está solicitando crédito para invertir en el negocio en la compra de ropa para damas, caballeros , niños, sandalias, entre otros productos que demandan sus clientes.
texts.en:
María Mercedes is 45 years old.  Her business is selling general merchandise.  She has been doing this activity on foot for several years.  This experience helps her customers visit her more, for the quality of clothes that her service offers.

María Mercedes is an entrepreneur who, without any knowledge of business, takes risks, but begins with her own capital.  Today she considers herself victorious because, in spite of not knowing, she took a risk where not everyone has this risk-taking attitude.

Currently she is requesting a loan to invest in her business buying clothing for women, men, and children, and sandals, among other products that her customers request.

loans.use: to buy clothing and sandals for women, men, and children.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
Wilfredo tiene 42 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Ica, conocida como “ la tierra del sol Eterno”, ya que siempre se puede disfrutar del sol en cualquier época del año, asimismo también por sus danzas típicas y por la “Laguna de Huacachina” conocida como  “el oasis de América” y sobre todo porque es una ciudad donde los pobladores son muy hospitalarios y generosos, además de ser optimistas ya que a pesar del terremoto sucedido en el año 2007 en el cual muchos pobladores perdieron la vida y quedaron damnificados, los pobladores salieron adelante. El Perú es muy conocido también por su deliciosa comida y uno de los platos que le gusta mucho a Wilfredo es el delicioso “Arroz con Pollo”, consiste en: arroz combinado con pollo, en presas o mechado, verduras (maíz desgranado, zanahoria en cubos, judías) y otras especias.

Wilfredo se dedica a su labor de cerrajero que consiste en reparar las cerraduras de puertas, reparación de candados, fabricación de llaves, él le dedica a su trabajo alrededor de 10 horas diarias en las cuales a pesar del intenso calor que hay en la ciudad el se desempeña com mucha fuerza, atiende alrededor de 10 clientes diariamente y puede ganar hasta S/.380 y en un día muy bueno puede ganar hasta S/. 500, 
El cree que le va bien en su negocio debido a que realiza una buena labor y sobre todo que es empeñoso al hacerla, además de atender a los clientes de manera amable.

Wilfredo está muy agradecido con el apoyo de los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a este apoyo el podrá comprar más herramientas y materiales y mejorar su taller de cerrajeria para la realización de su trabajo, con esta mejora tendrá mas materiales y realizara aun mejor su trabajo y tener un taller mas equipado, con ello obtendrá mas ingresos para si poder seguir ahorrando y poder cumplir su gran sueño: “Tener una empresa de servicios”.
texts.en:
Wilfredo, 42, lives in the city of Ica, known as The Land of the Eternal Sun because you can always enjoy the sun in any season of the year.  It is also known for its traditional dances and for the Huacachina Lagoon, known as The Oasis of America, and above all as a city whose residents are welcoming and generous as well as optimistic since they came out ahead in spite of the 2007 earthquake in which many lost their lives or were injured.  Peru is well known also for the delicious food, and one of the dishes that Wilfredo likes very much is the delicious chicken and rice, which has rice combined with chicken, in pieces or stuffed, vegetables (corn kernels, diced carrot, green beans), and other spices.

Wilfredo works at his job as a locksmith, which consists of repairing door locks, repairing padlocks, and making keys.  He works about 10 hours a day, which he does with great effort despite the intense heat in his city.  He waits on around 10 customers a day and can earn up to 380 PEN, and 500 PEN in a very good day.  He believes that his business is going well for him because he does a good job and above all he is hardworking in doing it.  He also takes care of the customers in a pleasant way.

Wilfredo is very grateful for the support of the Kiva lenders because thanks to this help he will be able to buy more tools and materials to improve his locksmith shop to do his work.  With this improvement he will have more materials and will do an even better job and have a better equipped shop.  With this he will get more income so he will be able to continue saving and be able to realize his biggest dream, to have a service enterprise.

loans.use: to buy tools and materials.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es: Gloria, de 25 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora, vive en una casa alquilada junto a su pareja Silvestre de 33 años y sus  queridos hijos Cresly de 07 años y Eli de 04 años de edad a quienes desea brindar un mejor bienestar. Gloria  y su pareja son el pilar de sus hijos, ya que Gloria desde muy niña sus padres le inculcaron a remover la tierra, es por ello que aprendió a labrarla. Hoy cuenta con 05 hectareas de terreno cultivados con plantas de cacao. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los peones quienes se encargan de cosechar y trasladar los frutos hasta los tendales. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es caminar por las áreas verdes y respirar aire puro que le brinda la naturaleza. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde su comunidad hasta los centros de acopio ubicados en la ciudad, lugar donde percibe mejores precios por sus productos. Su dificultad radica en no poder contar con suficiente ingreso económico para solventar los pagos por adelantado a los jornaleros quienes le brindan el apoyo con las cosechas y desmonte de malezas; es por ello que acude a los préstamos que facilita la institución MFP. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es sembrar más plantas de café ya que cuenta con terrenos sin cultivar. Este será su crédito numero 01 con MFP, sabe que si lo paga a tiempo, podrá acceder a otro préstamo con mayor tranquilidad. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles; contratará jornaleros para que lo apoyen en las cosechas de café y deshierbo de malezas.
texts.en:
Gloria, 25, is a very hardworking woman.  She lives in a rented house with her partner Silvestre, 33, and her two beloved children, Cresly, 7, and Eli, 4, whom she wants to give greater well-being.  Gloria and her partner are the pillars of their children because Gloria's parents instilled in her from a young age how to dig in the dirt.  That is how she learned to work the land.

Today she has five hectares of land planted with cacao plants.  During the harvest season she has the help of day laborers who are responsible for harvesting and moving the product to the drying areas.  What she likes most about her job is walking around the green areas and breathing the fresh air that nature gives her.  She considers the most difficult part to be transporting her products from her community to the distribution centers located in the city, where she gets better prices for her products.

Her difficulty is not being able to have enough income to make the payments in advance to the day laborers who help her with the harvests and weeding.  This is how she came to the loans that the MFP institution facilitates.  Her greatest priority now is to plant more coffee plants because she has land for planting.  This will be her first loan with MFP.  She knows that if she pays it on time she will be able to get another loan without worrying.

With the 1,500 PEN she will hire day laborers to help her with the coffee harvest and weeding.

loans.use: to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Asociacion Las Tres Estrellas Group

texts.es: En el hogar las mujeres parecieran tener una dotación especial de fortaleza que las hace invencibles.  Pueden dedicar cualquier cantidad de horas a trabajar incansablemente hasta alcanzar sus objetivos. Así es  Brenda ella tiene 19  años  y es soltera, Ella pertenece al grupo  "Asociacion las tres Estrellas" y está conformada por 7 integrantes, con el grupo tiene ya un año. Brenda siendo muy joven desde pequeña ayudaba a su mama en la jugueria, ahora ella administra el negocio con sus hermanas, la mayor motivación que tiene para trabajar es su madre ya que gracias a ella aprendio todo lo que tenia que hacer en la fuente de soda. La  satisfacción que le ha dejado el ser negociante es que ha logrado estudiar y dar educacion a sus hermanos, La señorita Brenda aseguró que ahora va a iniciar su segunda etapa, lo que significa que podrá invertir sin ningún problema y postular a ala universidad.
texts.en: At home, women seem to have a special source of strength that makes them invincible. They can dedicate any amount of time to working tirelessly to achieve their goals. Brenda is 19 years old and single. She belongs to the Three Stars Association (Asociacion las tres Estrellas) group. This group is composed of seven members. The group has been together one year. Since she was very young, Brenda has helped her mother with the juice store. Now she manages the store with her siblings. Her main motivation for working is her mother. Thanks to her, she learned everything she need to know to run the store. The satisfaction she gets from being a businesswoman has allowed her to study and to give an education to her siblings. Brenda said that now she is going to start her next chapter. She can invest without any problems and apply to university.

loans.use: purchase supplies.

loans.name: Grimaldo

texts.es: Grimaldo, de 57 años, es un hombre muy trabajador, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposa Getrudes de 49 años  y sus 02 queridos hijos Michael de 16 años y Yuri de 18 años; a quienes desea brindar una buena educación. Grimaldo es bien centrado en sus responsabilidades y obligaciones, ha Grimaldo la vida le enseñó tropiezos pero no se rindió al contrario trato de sobresalir y trabajó con mucho ahínco sobre sus plantas de café. Estos productos una vez cosechados los llevará a vender a la ciudad de San Francisco, en donde ya tiene diversos compradores, que sabiendo de la calidad de su producto no dudan en comprarle. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es sembrar sus tierras y hacerlas fértiles y productivas, lleva  20 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es trabajar en épocas de lluvia porque perjudican el rendimiento de su trabajo. El crédito solicitado es para el mantenimiento respectivo de sus cultivos como la poda y el desmonte de malezas. En adelante, espera seguir ahorrando sus ingresos por que desea comprar nuevas tierras. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, sabe que tiene que pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente y está dispuesto a hacerlo. En su banco comunal es un socio muy solidario y responsable. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles; contratará jornaleros para que le apoyen en el mantenimiento de sus plantas.
texts.en: Grimaldo, who is 57 years old, is a very hardworking man.  He lives in his own house along with his wife Getrudes, who is 49 years old.  He also lives with his two beloved children: Michael, who is 16 years old, and Yuri, who is 18 years old.  He wants to offer them a good education.  Grimaldo is well balanced in his responsibilities and obligations.  Life has taught Grimaldo some lessons, but it has not hindered him from excelling.  He worked diligently over his coffee plants.  Once these products are harvested, he takes them to the city of San Francisco to be sold.  He already has numerous purchasers who know the quality of his product and who do not worry about buying from him.  What he likes the most about his job is sowing his land and making them fertile and productive.  He has been doing this activity for 20 years and he considers the most difficult part of the job is working in the rainy season because it damages the yield of his work.  The sought after loan is for maintenance in respect to his crops such as pruning and weeding.  In the future, he hopes to continue saving his earnings because he want to buy new lands.  This will be his first loan with MFP.  He knows that he has to pay all off the installments punctually and he is ready to do it.  In his communal bank he is a supportive and responsible member.  With the 1,000 nuevos soles; he will hire day laborers to help with the maintenance of his plants.

loans.use: to hire day laborers

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es:
Doña Maria sigue comercializando, sus frutas, verduras, leña y  venta de sopa el fin de semana, en su casa de habitacion. Su esposo le ayuda con las ventas de verduras, y sus hijos estudiando.
Para ella, aumentar las ventas, ha sido de sastifaccion al poder obtener mejores ganancias, que ayude a limentar bien a sus hijos. Con este nuevo prestamo comprara: quintal de papas, canasto de cebolla, tomate, chiltoma, platanos, naranja, limones, repollo, granadilla y otras , con el fin de poder aumentar las ventas.
texts.en:
Doña María continues to sell fruits, vegetables and firewood, as well as soup over the weekend, from her home-based store.  Her husband helps her with the sale of vegetables. Their children attend school.

She noted with satisfaction that her increased sales generated higher earnings, which helped her to feed her children well. With this new loan she will buy one hundredweight of potatoes, one basket of onions, tomatoes, sweet peppers, bananas, oranges, lemons, cabbages, passion fruits and other products, in order to increase her sales.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables in order to increase her sales and continue to expand her business.

loans.name: Consuelo Antonia

texts.es: Consuelo Antonia, ya ha tenido crédito con Fundación León 2000 en el cual ha mostrado ser  una persona emprendedora, en estos meses nos cuenta que están buenas las ventas pero en la temporadas bajas ellas buscan estrategias para poder que los productos se le muevan, sus hijos están estudiando y los ha sacado adelante con muchos esfuerzos para darle todo lo necesario sin descuidar sus estudios que uno de los sueños de Consuelo es que sus hijos culminen sus estudios. Actualmente está solicitando crédito  para invertir en el negocio en la compra de productos como granos básicos, aceite, maíz, frijoles, jabón, entre otros productos que más se mueven.
texts.en: Consuelo Antonia was already granted a loan by the microfinance institution Fundación León 2000, in which she demonstrated her entrepreneurial spirit. She says that she had good sales over the previous months; however, in the low season she still must seek a strategy to boost her turnover. Her children are studying and she succeeded with great effort to make them progress. She gives them everything they need so that they don't have to neglect their studies, because one of Consuelo's dreams is to see her children complete their studies. She is currently applying for a loan to invest in her business. She will buy products, such as staple food, oil, corn, beans, soap, and other products in great demand.

loans.use: to buy staple food, oil, corn, beans, soap and other products.

loans.name: Julio

texts.es:
Julio, de 62 años de edad, esta casado con Domitila de 52 años y fruto de su relación concibieron  02 hijos  Hernán de 23 años y Reina de 14 años. Juntos habitan en su propia casa  donde reina la felicidad. Julio, es un hombre que se esmera cada día por dar lo mejor a sus hijos, su trabajo consiste en labrar la tierra, es campesino y cuenta con 06 hectáreas de terreno donde cultiva plantas de cacao. Viene trabajando durante 15 años y en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de los jornaleros; de esa manera extrae rápido los frutos y comercializa dichos productos a las empresas acopiadoras, quienes le remuneran muy bien por cada kilogramo de cada productos son vendidos. Considera que lo más difícil es transportar sus productos desde la chacra hasta la ciudad de san francisco; lugar donde le ofrecen mejores precios por sus productos; con el crédito solicitado contratara jornaleros para que le apoyen en el desmonte de malezas que aquejan sus plantaciones.
Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar mas semillas de cacao ya que cuenta con espacio suficiente para cultivar. Este es crédito numero 01 con MFP, esta dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea acceder a otro crédito más adelante. En su banco comunal es un socio muy participe.
Con los 1,000 nuevos soles contratara jornaleros para que le apoyen en el desmonte de malezas que aquejan sus plantaciones.
texts.en:
Julio, aged 62, is married to Domitila, aged 52. As a result of their relationship they have two children: Hernán is 23 years old and Reina 14. They live happily together in their own house. Julio is a man who puts a lot of effort every day into providing the best for his children. He is a farmer with 6 hectares of land, where he has been growing cacao plants for the past 15 years. At harvest time he counts on the support of hired day laborers and thus the fruit is quickly harvested and sold to wholesalers who pay him a very good price for each kilogram of his goods. Julio says that his biggest challenge is to transport the goods from the farm to the city of San Francisco, a place where he gets a better price.

Julio applies for this loan of 1000 new soles to hire day laborers to weed his plantations. But currently his highest priority is to buy cacao seeds because he has enough acreage to plant them. This is his first loan with the microfinance institution Microfinanzas Prisma. He is committed to pay the installments on time, because later on he wants to have access to another loan. He is very involved in his communal bank.

loans.use: to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Mulay De Curiquinga (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Maluay de Curiquinga está formado por 10 mujeres, luchadoras, trabajadoras que buscan la manera de salir  adelante con su trabajo, laboran en diferentes actividades las mismas que le permiten aportar a la economía de sus hogares y sacar en adelante a sus familias. Viven por los alrededores de la parroquia del Valle en Cuenca, esta parroquia se caracteriza por la belleza de su naturaleza en donde se puede disfrutar de momentos de paz fuera del ruido de la ciudad. Su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales y a la agricultura, muchos laboran en la ciudad en diferentes áreas de trabajo, mantienen las tradiciones y cultura de sus pueblos.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. Patricia, tiene 40 años, vive en unión libre y ha concebido 2 hijos de 3 y 2 años de edad, su esposo labora en la construcción trabajando como albañil, no tienen casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.
 
Doña Patricia se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar y al cuidado de sus hijos ya que aun son pequeños, también labora en la agricultura y lava ropa ajena cuando le llaman para que realice estas actividades.
 
Se encuentra en el tercer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y  lo va a invertir en la compra de víveres para su hogar.

Su sueño es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
The communal bank Maluay de Curiquinga is made up of 10 hard-working women looking for a way to get ahead in their jobs.  They work in different activities, the same ones that allow them to contribute to their household finances and provide for their families.  The live on the outskirts of the Valle en Cuenca parish.  This parish is known for its natural beauty where one can enjoy peaceful moments away from the noise of the city.  The people work as merchants, raise animals, work in agriculture and many work in different lines of work in the city.  They maintain the traditions and culture of their people.  

One of the members of this group is Señora Particia.  She is 40 years old, lives in a common law marriage and has 2 children, ages 3 and 2.  Her husband works in construction as a mason.  They don't own their own house, so they rent.  Doña Patricia is dedicated to the household chores and to caring for the children as they are still young.  She also works in agriculture and washes clothes for others when they call her.  

This is her third loan with her communal bank and she will use it to buy groceries for her household.  

Her dream is to have her own house.

loans.use: purchase groceries.

loans.name: Monica Viviana

texts.es:
Monica es una mujer tranquila, estricta y muy responsable en las actividades que tiene que hacer. Monica es casada y tiene dos hijos, vive con su familia y un hermano en Cotacachi que se encuentra a 15 minutos de Otavalo en la Provincia de Imbabura.

Monica trabaja con su hermano en la confección de mochilas, maletas y billeteras, las cuales entrega a empresas que le soliciten. Es la primera vez que trabaja con Fodemi, el crédito va a invertir en la compra de cierres, tubos de tela e hilos ya que tiene un pedido grande de Marathon y necesita todos estos materiales para cumplir con su labor y de esta manera poder obtener un buen ingreso que ayudará a mantener a su familia ya que es el único ingreso que tiene.

Su sueño es poder dar una buena educación a sus hijos y que su negocio crezca.
texts.en:
Monica is a very calm and disciplined woman.  She is very responsible with the business activities that she has to do.  Monica is married and has two children.  She lives with her family and a brother in Cotacachi, which is 15 minutes from Otavalo in the Imbabura province.

Monica works with her brother making backpacks, valises, and wallets.  She delivers them to the businesses that have ordered them.

This is the first time she has worked with Fodemi.  She will use the loan to buy zippers, fabric, and thread because she has a big order from Marathon.  She needs all of these materials to finish her work.  That way she will be able to get a good income, which will help support her family.  This is the only source of income that she has.

Her dream is to be able to give her children a good education.  She also dreams of her business growing.

loans.use: to buy zippers, fabric, and thread because she has a big order to fill.

loans.name: Moises

texts.es: Moisés, de 46 años de edad, esta casado con Felicidad y fruto de relación tienen 03 hijos y juntos residen en su propia casa en la comunidad de Camunachari. Hace 18 años, cuando Moises era adolescente trabajaba en las tierras de sus padres, actualmente posee su propia parcela cultivados con plantas de cacao. La clave de su éxito radica en la creatividad y las ganas de trabajar, sus plantas están trabajadas de manera tecnificada porque recibe capacitación de los Ingenieros Agrónomos periódicamente. Su producto con mayor demanda es el grano del cacao por la calidad del producto que los ofrece y fruto de ello percibe buenos réditos económicos. Normalmente trabaja solo, pero en tiempos de cosecha contrata jornaleros, de esa manera avanza con mayor celeridad en la extracción y selección de su producto. Con el crédito solicitado contratará jornaleros para que lo apoyen en las cosechas y sacar la maleza. Su plan a futuro es seguir ampliando su producción agrícola para que de esa manera pueda seguir satisfaciendo a sus clientes. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, sabe que el dinero del crédito le será de mucha utilidad en el progreso de su trabajo. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles; contratará jornaleros para que lo apoyen en la cosecha y desmonte de maleza.
texts.en:
Moisés, age 46, is married to Felicidad and has three children.  They live together in their own house in the Camunachari community.  Eighteen years ago, when Moises was an adolescent, he worked the land with his parents.

He now has his own land where he cultivates cacao plants.  The key to his success stems from creativity and the desire to work.  He works with his plants in a high-tech way because he periodically gets training from the agricultural engineers.  His product that has the greatest demand is the cacao bean because of the quality of the product.  He gets good financial return from this product.

He normally works alone, but during the harvest time he hires day workers.  This way harvesting and sorting his products are done with more speed.

He will use the loan to contract day workers to help him during the harvests and to clear the fields.

His plan for the future is to continue increasing his agricultural production so that he is able to continue meeting his customer demand.

This will be his first loan with MFP.  He knows that the loan will be of great use to the progress of his work.  He will use the 1,000 soles to hire day workers to help him with the harvest and to clear the fields.

loans.use: to hire day workers.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa, de 19 años, es una joven espontánea y trabajadora, convive con Wilder  de 18 años y su pequeño hijo Wilder de 02 años; a quien desea brindar una buena educación. Rosa desde muy niña sus padres le inculcaron a trabajar en la chacra,  ahora es campesina y con sus ahorros acumulados y las de su pareja lograron comprarse su propio terreno donde cultiva plantas de café. Todos los días, muy temprano se dirige a trabajar en sus cultivos, pues del cuidado que le dé podrá obtener un buen fruto. Ella traslada  sus productos  desde su comunidad hasta los centros de acopio ubicado en la ciudad de San Francisco, puesto que es donde mejores precios recibe por sus productos.
Lleva 10 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es trabajar en temporadas de lluvia, porque perjudican el rendimiento de su trabajo. Con el dinero del crédito comprará sacos de abonos para mejorar sus cultivos. En lo futuro espera trabajar con la misma perseverancia que la caracteriza. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, manifiesta que el dinero del crédito le ayudará mucho en el progreso de su trabajo. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará sacos de abono para mejorar sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Rosa, age 19, is a spontaneous and hard-working woman.  She lives with 18 year old Wilder and her little two year old son, Wilder.  She wishes to give him a good education.  Ever since Rosa was a very young girl her parents involved her in working on the farm.

She is now a farmer.  With her accumulated savings and those of her life partner, they managed to buy their own land where they grow coffee.  Every day she heads out very early to work their crops.  With the care that she gives them she will be able to get a good quality yield.

She transports her products from her community to the distribution centers in the city of San Francisco.  That is where she gets the best prices for her products.  She has been doing this business activity for ten years.  She thinks the most difficult part is working during the rainy season because it impairs the output of her work.

She will use the loan to buy sacks of fertilizer to improve her crops.  In the future she hopes to work with the same perseverance that she is known for.

This will be her first loan with MFP.  She says that the loan will help her a great deal in the progress of her work.  She will use the 1,000 soles to buy sacks of fertilizer to improve her crops.

loans.use: to buy sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clothes of various styles and cosmetics.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy natural products.

loans.name: Karina Beatriz

texts.es:
Karina Beatriz, tiene 30 años de edad, casada desde hace 9 años, tiene 3 hijas de 1, 4 y 6 años, vive en Cofradia, Cortes. Su esposo trabaja en una empresa privada.
Karina se dedica a elaborar piñatas para la venta, desde pequeña aprendió hacer esta actividad. Actualmente tiene mas de tres años de establecido su negocio. Vende piñatas en su casa y por encargo según el diseño. Le dedica 6 horas todos los días. 
Esta recibiendo un segundo préstamo para invertir en materia prima como papel china, pegamento y alambre. Su meta es ampliar el negocio, para obtener más ingresos y ayudar a una mejor calidad de vida para su familia.
texts.en:
Karina Beatriz, 30, has been married for nine years and has three daughters who are 1, 4 and 6 years old; she lives in Cofradía, Cortes and her husband is employed at a private firm.

Karina makes piñatas to sell.  She learned how to make them when she was a little girl.  To date, her business has been in operation for more than three years.  She sells piñatas at home and on order according to the design.  She spends six hours daily at work.

She is getting her second loan to invest in raw materials like crepe paper, glue and wire.  Her goal is to expand the business to earn more income and help to improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to buy piñata making supplies.

loans.name: Ligia Cumanda

texts.es:
La Señora. Ligia es socia del banco comunal Sector 3 Marías, vive en una comunidad que  pertenece a la parroquia de Turi en Cuenca, esta parroquia es conocida como el mirador de la Ciudad ya que se puede observar gran parte de la ciudad, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales y a la agricultura, se caracterizan por ser amables y gentiles.

Doña Ligia tiene 36 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 18, 16, 14 y 12 años de edad, su primer hijo trabaja solo para solventar sus gastos, dos  estudian en un  colegio de la ciudad y su ultima hija sufre una leve discapacidad y se encuentra en cursos de pintura. Su esposo labora como carpintero, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

La Señora Ligia tiene un taller con operarias en donde se dedican a la elaboración de pantalones, tiene su taller hace un año, trabaja de lunes a sábados las ocho horas laborables, como su negocio tiene en su casa también cría pollos y cerdos.
 
Es socia del banco comunal hace 7 años y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de hilos.
 
Su meta es tener un almacén para vender la ropa que elabora.
texts.en:
Ligia is a member of the “Sector 3 Marías” communal bank and lives in a community belonging to Turi Parish in Cuenca.  This parish is known at the city’s overlook because a great part of the city can be observed from here; its residents are merchants, raise animals and farm.  They are noted for being kind and nice.

Ligia is 36 years old, married and has had four children who are 18, 16, 14 and 12 years old.  Her oldest son works just to cover his personal expenses, two go to a secondary school in the city and her youngest daughter has a slight disability and is taking painting courses.  Her husband works as a carpenter and the house she lives in is hers.

Ligia has a workshop with employees where they manufacture pants.  She’s had the shop for a year and works Monday through Saturday 8 hours per day.  Since her business is home-based, she also raises chickens and pigs.

She’s been a communal bank member for 7 years and will use her new loan to buy thread.  Her goal is to have a store in which to sell the clothes she makes.

loans.use: to buy thread.

loans.name: Ana Mariana

texts.es:
La Señora. Ana es socia del banco comunal Sector 3 Marías, vive en una comunidad que  pertenece a la parroquia de Turi en Cuenca, esta parroquia es conocida como el mirador de la Ciudad ya que se puede observar gran parte de la ciudad, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales y a la agricultura, se caracterizan por ser amables y gentiles.

La Señora Ana esta delicada de salud ya que sufre de la Diabetes, por lo cual debe estar en un tratamiento constante, agradece a Dios por la salud de toda su familia. 

Doña Ana es de profesión costurera y tiene su taller hace varios años, como su trabajo lo realiza desde su casa tiene el tiempo para dedicarse a la cría de pollos, cuyes y cerdos.

Se ha dedicado a laborar en estas actividades porque así puede aportar a la economía de su hogar y lo más importante  es que son trabajos que le gustan y los realiza con mucho agrado, el dinero de su crédito anterior lo ha invertido en la compra de animales, en tela e hilo para continuar con su negocio. En el pago de su crédito no ha tenido ninguna dificultad realizando la cancelación a la fecha.

El banco comunal le gusta por la facilidad para conseguir los créditos y por la unión y compañerismo que existe en el grupo. Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de tela, hilos, pollos y cuyes para continuar con sus negocios.
texts.en:
Ana is a member of the “Sector 3 Marías” communal bank and lives in a community that belongs to Turi Parish in Cuenca.  This parish is known as the City’s Overlook because a great part of the city can be observed from there.  Its residents are merchants, raise animals and farm; they are noted for being nice and kind.

Ana is in precarious health because she has diabetes so must be under constant treatment; she thanks God for her family’s health.

Ana is a seamstress by profession and has had her workshop for several years.  Since her work is home-based, she has time to raise chickens, guinea pigs and pigs.

She has decided to work in these activities because she can contribute to her home’s economy and most importantly because they are jobs that she likes and does with much satisfaction.  The money from her previous loan was used to buy animals, fabric and thread to continue in business.  She has had no problem repaying the loan and has been making her payments on time.

She likes the communal bank because of the ease in getting loans and because of the unity and companionship that exists among the members.  She will use her new loan to buy thread, fabric, chickens and guinea pigs to continue with her businesses.

loans.use: to buy thread, chickens and guinea pigs.

loans.name: Rosa Maclovia

texts.es:
La Señora. Rosa es socia del banco comunal Sector 3 Marías, vive en una comunidad que  pertenece a la parroquia de Turi en Cuenca, esta parroquia es conocida como el mirador de la Ciudad ya que se puede observar gran parte de la ciudad, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales y a la agricultura, se caracterizan por ser amables y gentiles.

Doña Rosa se encuentra muy bien en su salud al igual que toda su familia. Ella se dedica a la cría de pollos, inicio esta actividad con el primer crédito  que realizo en la banca comunal. Hace dos meses comenzó a trabajar en la limpieza de casas, se dedica a estos trabajos para poder aportar a la economía de su hogar y sacar adelante a sus hijos.
 
El crédito anterior lo ha invertido en la compra de pollos y en alimento para los mismos, en el pago de su crédito se atrasado una letra debido a que su mamá se encontraba enferma pero ya esta al día en sus pagos.
 
La banca comunal le gusta por el compañerismo que existe en el grupo y la facilidad para conseguir los créditos. Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y cerdos.
texts.en:
Rosa is a member of the “Sector 3 Marías” communal bank and lives in a community that belongs to Turi Parish in Cuenca.  This parish is known as the City’s Overlook because a great part of the city can be observed from there.  Its residents are merchants, raise animals and farm; they are noted for being nice and kind.

Rosa as well as her entire family are in very good health .  She raises chickens, an activity she started with the first loan cycle in the communal bank.  Two months ago she started working cleaning houses.  She does these jobs to contribute to household economy and raise her children.

She used her previous loan to buy chickens and chicken feed.  She was late with one payment because her mother got sick but she’s caught up on her payments now.

She likes the communal bank because of the companionship that exists among the members and because of the ease in getting loans.  She will use her new loan to buy chickens and pigs.

loans.use: to buy chickens and pigs.

loans.name: Luz Margarita

texts.es:
La Señora Luz es socia del banco comunal Zhullin, vive en por el sector que lleva el mismo nombre en la ciudad de Azogues, esta ciudad es conocida como San Francisco de Peleusí de Azogues y es considerada como una ciudad patrimonio arquitectónico y cultural del Ecuador, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales y a la agricultura, se caracterizan porque ser gente amable y gentil, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones.
 
La Señora. Luz tiene 30 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 10, 6,4 años y un bebé de 10 meses de edad, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en una escuelita de la localidad. Su esposo labora en una panadería como panificador, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
  
Ella se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar en donde pasa al cuidado de sus hijos y también cría pollos y cuyes a los que los vende en su comunidad cuando tiene alguna necesidad económica.
 
En el banco comunal se encuentra en su cuarto crédito y lo va a invertir en la compra de gallinas y en alimento para las mismas.
 
Su sueño es que sus hijos estudien y lleguen a ser buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Luz is a member of the “Zhullin” communal bank.  She lives in the sector of the same name in the city of Azogues.  This city is known as San Francisco de Peleusí de Azogues and is considered to be one of Ecuador’s cultural and architectonic heritage cities.  Its residents are merchants, raise animals and farm and are noted for being nice and kind people; they preserve their culture and traditions.

Luz is 30 years old, married and has had four children who are 10, 6, 4 year old and a 10-month-old baby.  Her two oldest children go to the local elementary school.  Her husband works as a baker in a bakery.  They do not own a house; they rent.

She does her household chores where she spends her time caring for her children and also raises chickens and guinea pigs that she sells in her community whenever she needs money.

She’s in her fourth cycle in the communal bank and will use the loan to buy chickens and chicken feed.  Her dream is that her children study and become good professionals.

loans.use: to buy chickens and chicken feed.

loans.name: Marjorie Marisela

texts.es:
La Señora. Marjorie es socia del banco comunal Zhullin, vive en por el sector que lleva el mismo nombre en la ciudad de Azogues, esta ciudad es conocida como San Francisco de Peleusí de Azogues y es considerada como una ciudad patrimonio arquitectónico y cultural del Ecuador, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales y a la agricultura, se caracterizan porque ser gente amable y gentil, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones.
 
Doña Marjorie tiene 28 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 13, 8, 5 años de edad y está muy contenta ya que se encuentra a días de dar a luz a su cuarto hijo. Su esposo labora como podador de parques y jardines, la casa en la que viven es de su propiedad.
 
La Señora. Marjorie se dedica a cuidar a sus hijos y en sus tiempos libres vende cosméticos de la marca Avon, actividad que la desempeña hace 5 años. En su casa cría pollos.
 
Este es su quinto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir para la compra de cosméticos para ampliar su negocio.
 
Su sueño es crecer más en su negocio y salir en adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Marjorie is a member of the “Zhullin” communal bank.  She lives in the sector of the same name in the city of Azogues.  This city is known as San Francisco de Peleusí de Azogues and is considered to be one of Ecuador’s cultural and architectonic heritage cities.  Its residents are merchants, raise animals and farm and are noted for being nice and kind people; they preserve their culture and traditions.

Marjorie is 28 years old, married and has three children who are 13, 8 and 5 years old.  She is very happy because she’s about to give birth to her fourth child.  Her husband works as a pruner in parks and gardens.  The house they live in is theirs.

Marjorie works taking care of her children and in her free time she sells Avon brand cosmetics, an activity she’s been in for the last five years; she also raises chickens at home.

This is the fifth loan she’s taken out in the communal bank and she is going to use it to buy cosmetics to expand her business.  Her dream is to grow more in business and to get ahead with her family.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Verónica De La Nube

texts.es:
La Señora Verónica es socia del banco comunal Zhullin, vive en por el sector que lleva el mismo nombre en la ciudad de Azogues, esta ciudad es conocida como San Francisco de Peleusí de Azogues, y es considerada como una ciudad patrimonio arquitectónico y cultural del Ecuador, su gente se dedica al comercio, cría de animales y a la agricultura, se caracterizan porque ser gente amable y gentil, mantienen la cultura y tradiciones.
 
La Señora. Verónica tiene 29 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 2 hijos de 7 y 2 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es empleado privado, la casa en la que vive es de su propiedad.

Doña Verónica se dedica al cuidado de su hogar ya que sus hijos aun son pequeños, también cría gallinas que son para su consumo y tiene una tienda de comestibles hace 5 años en la cual trabaja de domingo a domingo.
 
En el banco comunal se encuentra en su tercer crédito el cual lo va a invertir en la compra de productos de primera necesidad para su tienda.
 
Su meta es acabar sus estudios Universitarios.
texts.en:
Verónica is a member of the “Zhullin” communal bank.  She lives in the sector of the same name in the city of Azogues.  This city is known as San Francisco de Peleusí de Azogues and is considered to be one of Ecuador’s cultural and architectonic heritage cities.  Its residents are merchants, raise animals and farm and are noted for being nice and kind people; they preserve their culture and traditions.

Verónica is 29 years old, married and has two children who are 7 and 2 years old.  Her oldest son attends the local little school and her husband is a private employee.  The house she lives in is hers.

Verónica works taking care of her home because her children are still small but she also raises chickens for her own consumption and has had a grocery store for the last five years where she works Sunday to Sunday.

She’s in her third loan with the communal bank and will use it to buy basic staple items for her store.  Her goal is to complete her University education.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Nueva Ilusión (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Nueva Ilusión está formado por 9 socias quienes son mujeres emprendedoras, luchadoras y muy trabajadoras ganándose el pan de cada día con su esfuerzo, así han logrado sacar a su familia adelante y ofrecerles un mejor futuro. Viven por la parroquia de Cumbe en Cuenca, parroquia de grandes pastos  y de fincas ganaderas, modernas construcciones y el encanto de la arquitectura tradicional. Su gente es amable y mantienen la cultura y tradiciones de sus padres. 

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señorita. Jessica, tiene 20 años de edad, es soltera y vive con sus padres, su papá es maestro albañil y su mamá se dedica a los quehaceres de su hogar, la casa en la que vive es propiedad de sus padres.
 
La Señorita. Jessica ayuda en los quehaceres de la casa pero también se dedica a la cría de animales como pollos y cuyes a los que los vende en su comunidad. También labora en la agricultura y lo que cosecha es para su consumo y para la venta.

Se encuentra en el quinto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y en alimento para los mismos.
 
Su meta es seguir los estudios Universitarios y llegar a ser profesional.

Los niños que se encuentran en la fotografía son hijos de algunas de las socias.
texts.en:
The “Nueva Ilusión” (New Hope) communal bank is composed of nine members who are enterprising, tenacious, very hardworking women earning their daily bread through their efforts and raising their families this way offering them a better future.  They live in Cusco’s Cumbe Parish, a parish of vast grasslands and cattle ranches, modern constructions and the charm of traditional architecture.  Its residents are kind and preserve the culture and traditions of their ancestors.

One of the group members is Jessica, 20.  She’s single and lives with her parents.  Her father is a master bricklayer and her mother does housework.  The house she lives in belongs to her parents.

Jessica helps with housework but also raises animals like chickens and guinea pigs that she sells in her community.  She also works in farming and what she harvests is both for her own consumption and to sell.

She’s in the fifth loan with the communal bank and she will use it to buy chickens and chicken feed.  Her goal is to continue with her University classes and become a professional.  

The children in the photo are the children of some of the members.

loans.use: to buy chickens and chicken feed.

loans.name: Sally

texts.en:
Sally is from Barangay 5, Tangub City. She is 44 years old, married, and has three adult children. 

Sally makes a living by preparing and selling fried chicken to the local community. Sally has been engaged in her business for 5 years and earns 10,000 PHP a month through this work. 

In 2010, Sally joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Sally is requesting a loan of 30,000 PHP which will be used to purchase raw ingredients needed for food preparation. She plans to use the additional revenue generated through use of the loan to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients needed to make food for sale.

loans.name: Silvia Dominga

texts.es:
Silvia, de 40 años de edad, es comerciante, dueña de una pulpería tiene 2 hijos, vive en la ciudad de León. Inicio sus actividades en la venta cuando su madre enfermo  ella heredo la pulpería que al mismo tiempo le ayudo a ella a generar ingresos para ella y su familia. Ella tiene 5 años de administrar este negocio el cual ha salido adelante poco a poco.
Ella realizo el crédito para comprar granos básicos, productos de limpieza, sopas,leche,jugos,huevos, pan ,avenas enlatados, papel de baños. Pues necesita mantener surtida la venta de productos de mucha utilidad y necesidad para vender y abastecer a sus  clientes. Una de sus metas es comprar estantes y vitrinas para exhibir sus productos.
texts.en:
Silvia, 40, is a merchant; she owns a grocery store.  She has two children and lives in the city of León.  She started her sales when her mother became ill and she inherited the grocery store which helped her generate income for herself and her family.  She’s been running this business for five years and has gotten ahead little by little.

She took out this loan to buy basic grains, cleaning supplies, soups, milk, juices, eggs, bread, oats, canned gods and toilet paper because she needs to keep the store stocked with products of high utility and need to sell and supply her customers.  One of her goals is to buy shelving and display cases to exhibit her wares.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en: Mary Jane is a married woman who has two children. Mary Jane is 34 years old and resides at Poblacion 3, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Mary Jane used her last loan to purchase materials needed to expand services. Her business has grown up and become successful. Now she's taking a new loan to purchase auto spare parts and accessories. Positively, she hopes to be able to grow her business further.

loans.use: to purchase auto spare parts and accessories

loans.name: Perlita

texts.en:
Perlita, is a widow with four children. Perlita is 61 years old and resides at Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. 

Perlita owns and operates a coconut crop with a lemon business venture to earn a living and she's been in this business for 15 years. Each month, she earns 10,000 PHP doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 35,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. 

In 2006, Perlita joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Perlita wants to make improvements to her house and to finish the studies of her children.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loans.name: Jorelyn

texts.en:
Jorelyn is from Macupa Tangub. She is 40 years old. Jorelyn is married and has four school-aged children. 

To make a living, Jorelyn owns & operates a business venture in the agriculture sector planting & harvesting banana for sale. Jorelyn has been engaged in her business for 12 years and earns 5,000 PHP a month for these activities. 

In 2009, Jorelyn joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Jorelyn is requesting a new loan of 10,551 PHP, which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loans.name: Chantha

texts.en: Chantha, 25, is married and resides with her husband, her mother and three children in Prey Veng Province, Cambodia. She is a distiller. Her husband is a rice farmer. Due to the small amount of agricultural yield that she gets every year, Chantha requests a loan of USD 1,000 to purchase more farmland to grow rice in order to get a high yield. In the future, she would like to run a grocery store at home to generate more income to support the family and send her children to a good school.

loans.use: to purchase more farmland to grow rice

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
Josefina is from Macupa Tangub City. She is 55 years old, married, and has two adult children. 

To make a living, Josefina owns and operates a general store, selling a variety of different products in the local community. Josefina has been engaged in her business for 21 years and earns 2,500 PHP a month for these activities. 

In 2010, Josefina joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Josefina is requesting a new loan of 7,800 PHP, which will be used to purchase new items to expand her product offering. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase new items to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy merchandise and expand her business.

loans.name: Sokha

texts.en: Sokha, 37, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Kampong Cham Province, Cambodia. She and her husband are volunteer staff in an orphan-control related organization. Due to less salary, Sokha is requesting a loan of USD 300 to pay for a farming expense of growing potatoes. By doing so, she can generate extra income to support her family. To generate more income in the future, she would like to purchase more farmland and grow more agricultural crops, build a new house and support her children's studies until they get their Bachelors degrees.

loans.use: to pay for a farming expense of growing potatoes.

loans.name: Rosana

texts.en: Rosana, 42, is married and a mother of four children. She lives in Poblacion 4, Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. Rosana used her last loan to purchase expensive fish to sell. Her business is successful, and she is taking a new loan which will be used to purchase new items to expand her product offering. She is running her other business venture particularly in the retail sector. In the future she hopes to be able to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase new items to expand her product offerings.

loans.name: Raksa`

texts.en:
Raksa, 28, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. Since 2000, she has worked as a farmer raising  animals, earning income of USD 3.5 per day. Since 2000, her husband has been a construction worker earning USD 5 per day. Family monthly expenses are: food; USD 42, utilities; USD 5, and other expense; USD 15. 

In order to improve her family livelihood, Raksa is requesting a loan of USD 500 to buy a motorbike for her husband to drive to work. By doing so, she will reduce her transportation expenses. In the future, she would like to raise animals to generate more income for her family. She also plans to fix some parts of her house and support her children's studies until they get their Bachelor's degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for her husband to drive to work.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio Cesar  tiene 25 años de edad, él vive en la Tinguiña, ubicadao en el departamento de Ica Perú. Ica se encuentra ubicado en el Desierto de Sechura cerca de cuatro horas al sur de Lima, la capital del país, y es aclamado por los peruanos como "La Tierra del Sol". Es conocida en el Perú por sus frecuentes terremotos (un 8,0 en 2007 y 6.9 en 2011), su producción de uvas, espárragos y aceitunas, y tal vez sobre todo, como la fuente de la bebida tradicional del Perú nacional, el Pisco. En este clima cálido y árido se encuentra la casa y empresa del cliente; como bien se sabe el Perú se caracteriza por tener las comidas más deliciosas del mundo y uno de los platos que a Julio Cesar  es la "Carapulca". Julio es Técnico en Computación, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar Medicina  Veterinaria.

Julio  actualmente es conductor de taxi , se dedica a este trabajo 8 horas diarias, en un día puede atender 30 clientes y esto le permite ganar  hasta S/. 70 diarios y en un buen día puede ganar hasta S/.90 lo que le ayuda en algunos gastos adicionales y para  invertir en el negocio, el cree que le va bien en su negocio debido a que es muy educado y amable con los clientes y sobre todo muy honesto. 

Actualmente está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que con la ayuda proporcionada va poder realizar mantenimiento a su vehículo, con esta mejora podrá ayudarle a tener un auto en buenas condiciones y los clientes se sientan seguros en su vehículo,  con ello tendrá mas ingresos y así seguirá ahorrando para comprarse un auto y poder realizar su gran sueño:” Trabajar en su carrera de Computación”
texts.en:
Julio César, 25, lives in La Tinguiña, located in the department of Ica, Peru.  Ica is located in the Sechura Desert about four hours south of Lima, the capital of the country, and is acclaimed by Peruvians as The Land of the Sun.  It is known in Peru for its frequent earthquakes (an 8.0 in 2007 and 6.9 in 2011), grape production, asparagus, and olives, and perhaps above all as the source of the traditional national beverage of Peru, pisco.  As is well known, Peru is known for having the most delicious food in the world, and one of the dishes that Julio César likes is "carapulca" [chicken with potatoes and peanuts].

In this warm and arid climate are his house and business.   Julio is a computer technician, but he would have liked to study veterinary medicine.

Currently Julio is a taxi driver.  He works at this job eight hours a day.  In one day he can serve 30 customers, and this allows him to earn up to 70 PEN daily, and in a good day he can earn up to 90, which helps him pay some additional household expenses and invest in the business.  He believes that it is going well for him in his job because he is very polite and pleasant with the customers and, above all, very honest.

Currently he is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because with the help offered he is going to be able to do maintenance on his vehicle.  This improvement will be able to help him have a car in good condition, and the customers will feel safe in his car.  With this he will have more income and so he will continue saving to buy himself a car and be able to realize his big dream, to work in his field of computing.

loans.use: to maintain his vehicle.

loans.name: Norma

texts.es:
Norma tiene 22 años de edad, ella vive en la tinguiña ubicada en el departamento de Ica, Perú. Ica se encuentra ubicado en el Desierto de Sechura cerca de cuatro horas al sur de Lima, la capital del país, y es aclamado por los peruanos como "La Tierra del Sol". Es conocida en el Perú por sus frecuentes terremotos (un 8,0 en 2007 y 6.9 en 2011), su producción de uvas, espárragos y aceitunas, y tal vez sobre todo, como la fuente de la bebida tradicional del Perú nacional, el Pisco. En este clima cálido y árido se encuentra la casa y empresa del cliente. Como bien se sabe el Perú se caracteriza por tener las comidas más deliciosas del mundo y uno de los platos que a norma  es Arroz Chaufa.  Norma tiene una pequeña a la que adora mucho de 6 años de edad que actualmente esta en primer grado de educación primaria.

Norma se se dedica al Venta de Ropa , se dedica a este trabajo 5 horas diarias. En un día norma puede atender a 5 clientes y esto le permite ganar gana aproximadamente un promedio de S/. 200 diarios y en un buen día puede ganar S/.300 lo que le ayuda en algunos gastos adicionales para el hogar  y para  invertir en el negocio, ella cree que le va bien a sus clientes porque los trata de manera amable y porque vende muy buenos productos. 

Actualmente  esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda proporcionada ella podrá comprar  mas mercadería para su negocio,  con ello tendra mas ingresos y asi podrá ahorrar lo que la ayudará a cumplir su gran sueño: Tener un local propio."
texts.en:
Norma is 22 years old and lives in La Tinguina, Ica department, Peru. Ica is located in the Sechura Desert about 4 hours south of Lima, the national capital. The region is known by Peruvians as “The Land of the Sun.” It is well-known for its earthquakes (one 8.0 in 2007 and 6.9 in 2011), and  producing grapes, asparagus, and olives, and perhaps, most of all, as the source of the traditional national drink, the Pisco. 

In this hot and arid climate, we find the house and enterprise of Norma. As is well know in Peru, here you will find the tastiest food in the world, and one of those plates Norma particularly likes is “Chaufa” Rice. Norma has a small child, 6 years old, that she adores very much, who is now in the 1st grade in primary school.

Norma sells clothing for 5 hours daily. In a normal day she can attend to 5 customers and earns approximately an average of 200 new sols daily, and in a good day she can earn 300 new sols, enough to help cover some of their household expenses, and to invest in her business. She feels that things are going well with her customers, because she treats them amiably and sells good products.

Norma wishes to express her gratitude to Kiva investors, since the aid they offer enables her to buy more merchandise for her business. With this, she will earn more money and thus, she can save money that will help her reach her great dream: to have a store she owns.

loans.use: buy more merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Geneflor

texts.en:
Geneflor is a married woman who has two children. She is 33 years old, residing at Clarin, Misamis Occidental, Philippines. 

Geneflor owns and operates a farm business, planting & harvesting bananas for sale to earn a living and she's been three years in this business. Each month, she earns 5,000 PHP doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 20,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. 

In 2008, Geneflor joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her business and living situation. In the future, Geneflor wants to make improvements to her house and see her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise.

loans.name: Sophea

texts.en:
Sophea, 40, is widowed and resides with three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She and one of her children work in a shoe-producing factory. They earn USD 5 per day. Family monthly expenses for food are USD 25, utility expense is USD 7 and school fees for her children are USD 50. 

Sophea is requesting a loan of USD 500 to pay for her child's wedding expenses. In the future, she hopes her family can build a new house and she can buy some clothes to sell. Moreover, she wants to support her children's studies until they get Bachelor's Degree.

loans.use: to pay for her child's wedding expenses.

loans.name: Myryan Yaninna

texts.es:
Myryan es una joven muy emprendedora, vive en la ciudad de chincha, ciudad por su población de origen afroperuano, por sus danzas y es la cuna de grandes glorias del deporte peruano, por sus hermosas playas y por la producción de nuestro producto Bandera el “Pisco”, también esta ciudad es muy conocida por su comida ya que los pobladores de esa ciudad se les conoce por la buena sazon que tienen, tiene 19 años de edad y a su edad es muy responsable y sobre todo luchadora, es conviviente y su pareja la apoya mucho en todo lo que ella hace, es su mano derecha, cuando se siente preocupada o cansada el le da animos para seguir y es por ello que ella lo quiere mucho, actualmente su pareja trabaja en la municipalidad de su ciudad y con ello tienen mas ingresos para su hogar, asi como también esta estudiando contabilidad .

Myryan se dedica a la repostería, vende dulces, gelatinas, tortas alfajores, bocaditos, recorre las calles de su barrio ofreciendo sus dulces pero no solo se dedica a ello sino también vende gas domestico, en su casa, Myryan es muy trabajadora, le dedica a su negocio alrededor de 9 horas diarias, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio debido a que prepara de una manera muy deliciosa sus dulces y porque es muy ordenada y le gusta la limpieza por ello los clientes se animan a comprar su productos, además de que le gusta tratar de manera amable a los clientes.

Myryan está muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a su apoyo ella podrá comprar más materiales e insumos para su negocio de dulces, con ello tendra mas ingresos para si poder seguir invirtiendo en su negocio, asi como también ahorrar para mejorar para cumplir su gran sueño:” Crecer como Microempresaria”
texts.en:
Myryan is a very hardworking young woman.  She lives in the city of Chincha, which is known for its population of Afro-Peruvian origin, its dances, its reputation as the birthplace of great moments in Peruvian sports, its beautiful beaches, and for the production of its flagship product, Pisco.  The city is also famous for its cuisine, since the residents of Chincha are known for using good seasoning in their cooking. 

Myryan is 19 years old and is very responsible and, above all, tenacious.  She lives with her partner, who helps her with everything that she does—he is her right hand, and whenever she feels worried or tired he encourages her to keep going, and that is why she loves him so much.  Myryan’s partner currently works for the city government, and because of his job they have more income for their household, which is how he is able to study accounting.  

Myryan earns a living making and selling sweets, jello, cakes, and snacks.  She walks along the streets of her neighborhood selling her products; however, this is not her only livelihood, as she also sells gas cylinders from her home.  Myryan is very hardworking, and devotes about 9 hours a day to her business.  She thinks that her business is going well because she prepares sweets in a way that makes them very delicious, and because she likes to be neat and tidy.  These factors encourage customers to purchase her products, and it also helps that she treats her customers in a friendly manner.

Myryan is very grateful to Kiva lenders, because it is thanks to their support that she will be able to purchase more materials and ingredients for her sweets business.  This will allow her to earn more income, which she will be able to invest in her business.  This will also allow her to save so that she can more easily achieve her dream: “To grow as a micro-entrepreneur.”

loans.use: to purchase ingredients and supplies for making sweets.

loans.name: Sopen

texts.en:
Sopen, 35, is married and resides with her husband and six children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. Nowadays, she’s basket producer, earning USD 2 per day. Her husband and one of her children are construction workers, earning USD 9.50 per day. Family monthly expenses for food are USD 30, utility expense is USD 6, and school fees for her children are USD 17. Other expenses come to USD 25. 

Sopen is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase construction materials to build her house. This loan will help her have a nice house and good living conditions. In the future, she wants to improve her living standard by collecting baskets from other makers to sell at the market to get more income. Moreover, she wants to support her children to study more to become a teacher.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to build her house.

loans.name: Monalisa

texts.en:
Monalisa is from Macupa, Tangub City. She is 33 years old. Monalisa is married and has three children. 

To make a living, Monalisa owns & operates a business venture planting and harvesting coconuts for sale. Monalisa has been in her business for 10 years and earns approximately 2,000 PHP a month for these activities. 

In 2009, Monalisa joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. Monalisa is requesting a new loan of 7,600 PHP, which will be used to purchase fertilizers such as manure. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers such as manure.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
