This will be her 4th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans for household expenses, bought more TVs and DVD machines and has paid back all her loans successfully.  She wants a loan to buy more TV sets and DVD machines to sell.

She will share this loan with her loan group "DDC" which has a total of 16 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more TV sets and DVD machines.

loans.name: Winfred

texts.en:
Winfred is 45 years old.  She is married to Joseph and they have three children.  She has been operating a cereals retail stall for the last 10 years and earns a monthly income of 6,800 KES.

She is applying for her first loan in the amount of 30,000 KES.  With it, Winfred intends to purchase additional stock of maize, beans and green grams, or mung beans. With the anticipated profit generated from the loan, she will purchase additional cereals to add to her inventory. 

She hopes and dreams to grow her business into a cereal wholesale store.

loans.use: to purchase cereals like maize, beans and green grams (mung beans).

loans.name: Ikhlas

texts.en: Ikhlas, 34 years old, is a housewife who has two kids. Four years ago, Ikhlas started a small business making baskets at home and selling them to relatives, friends, and neighbors. During these four years, she enhanced her products and started making trays of the same material. She accessorized the baskets she made based on the occasion they were made for, like wedding baskets, baby shower baskets, ordinary baskets, and others. Now Ikhlas want to make more items that would be creative and unique, so she has applied for a loan to buy more material and accessories to be able to do that.

loans.use: to buy more materials to make more products

loans.name: Mwanaisha

texts.en:
Mwanaisha is a 59-year-old married woman.  She has seven children ranging in age from 18 years to 35 years.  She describes herself as social and responsible.  

Mwanaisha operates a food stall where she sells food.  She has been in business for seven years and her food stall is located in a residential area.  She describes her biggest business challenge to be the high cost of ingredients for the food she sells.  She will use the loan of 20,000 KES to pay for the construction of a restaurant. 

Mwanaisha's business goal is to run a big hotel within five years.

loans.use: to pay for the construction of a restaurant.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is 30 years old.  He is married and has one four-year-old child.   He sells mobile phones and accessories to earn a living.  He has been in business for five years and employs one person.  He describes his business environment as busy because many customers visit him daily.  

He has applied for a loan in the amount of 50,000 KES to buy mobile phones and accessories.  Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income.  He hopes to be financially stable in the future.

loans.use: to buy mobile phones and accessories.

loans.name: Afuany

texts.en:
Afuany is 24 years old.  She is a married woman with three children, one of which goes to school.  She operates a business, selling tea in Bor, South Sudan and has been in business for four years.

Afuany is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase sugar and coffee.  She will use the extra income generated from this loan to pay her child’s school fees.

loans.use: to purchase sugar and coffee to sell.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary, a 42-year-old mother of five and the wife of Mwaura, has been farming for the last 11 years, earning a monthly income of Kes 10,500. She is applying for her first loan with KADET for Kes 30,000 to purchase seeds and pesticides for her farm. She hopes to diversify into dairy farming with the anticipated profits.

loans.use: to purchase farming implements, pesticides, and seeds.

loans.name: Nyanyiir

texts.en:
Nyanyiir is a 30 year-old married woman with no child.  She has had a business of selling fish in Dokuru bor, South Sudan, for three years.
Nyanyiir is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Wesal

texts.en: Wesal, 51 years old, is a housewife who has six sons and daughters. The oldest daughter is now married. One of her youngest sons, Bilal, who is 21 years old, is majoring in interior design in one of the Jordanian colleges. His mother Wesal wants him to finish his studies so he can work in the same field, so she has applied for a loan to pay his semester’s tuition. Because Wesal is a conservative person, she asked her son Bilal to appear in the picture instead.

loans.use: To pay for her son's semester fees

loans.name: Anderson

texts.en:
Anderson is 48 years old and is married to Kalondu.  They have 5 children. He has been running a hotel business for the last 2 years, earning a monthly income of Kes 8900.

He is applying for his first loan with KADET of Kes 20,000.  He intends to use the funds to purchase stocks of cooking oil ,sugar and wheat flour for the hotel business.  With the anticipated profit, he will grow his business and diversify into farming.

His hopes and dreams are to do both hotel and farming.

loans.use: To purchase stock of cooking oil, sugar, and wheat flour for the hotel

loans.name: Paula Andrea

texts.es: Paula Andrea es una madre soltera cabeza de familia, que gracias a su empuje ha podido sacar adelante a sus tres hijos. Con 36 años de edad, Paula Andrea actualmente se encuentra trabajando en su puesto de comidas, actividad a la que debió recurrir desde que se quedó sin empleo y debía generar los ingresos necesarios para sostener a su familia. Paula Andrea se ha caracterizado por ser una persona muy trabajadora y siempre se ha esforzado por brindarles a sus tres hijos la mejor educación posible. Sueña con que su negocio crezca, con pasar de su carrito de comidas a una gran cafetería y dejarles así una estabilidad económica a sus hijos. Como en su negocio ha aumentado la variedad de productos que le ofrece a sus clientes, Paula Andrea requiere de la compra de insumos para su negocio como servilletas, vasos desechables, entre otros.
texts.en: Paula Andrea is a single mother who is head of her family.  Thanks to her effort she has been able to improve the lives of her three children.  Paula Andrea, 36, is currently working in her food stall-a business that she has had since she lost her job and needed to generate income to support her family.  Paula Andra is a very hardworking woman and she always makes the effort to offer her children the best education possible.  She dreams that her business will grow and she could go from a food cart to a big cafeteria and leave her children in good economic circumstances.  Since her business has increased with the variety of products that she sells to her customers, Paula Andrea needs to buy supplies such as napkins, disposable cups, etc.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her business

loans.name: Bader

texts.en: Bader, 21 years old, is one of six brothers and sisters. He is studying to become a nurse in the Applied University and he is now in his third year. He has applied for a loan to pay for his upcoming semester so he can graduate as soon as possible and get a job to help support his family.

loans.use: to pay for his upcoming semester

loans.name: Awel

texts.en:
Awel is a 35 year-old married woman with four children.  Two of them are in school.  She has had a business of selling fish in Dokuru bor, South Sudan, for one year.
Awel is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase fish.  She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fees.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy fertilizers and pesticides

loans.name: Rahmeh

texts.en: Rahmeh, 25 years old, has been married for almost a year now. In spite of being married, Rahmeh decided to continue studying to get her university degree. Now she wants to register for her last semester, so she can graduate and start her own business. She has applied for this loan in order to pay for her graduation semester fees.

loans.use: to pay her graduation semester fees.

loans.name: Fayzeh

texts.en: Fayzeh, a 48-year-old housewife, has four sons and one daughter. Fayzeh has applied for this loan to pay for her only daughter's semester fees. Her daughter, Majd, who is shown in the photo, is studying to become a teacher. She is now in her second year. Because Fayzeh is a conservative person, Majd agreed to be in the photo instead.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's semester fees

loans.name: Achok

texts.en:
Achok is a 30 year-old married woman with one child who is in school.  She has had a business of selling fish in Dokuru bor, South Sudan, for three years.
Achok is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay the school fee for her child.

loans.use: to purchase fish for sale.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es: Dedicación es una de las palabras con las que mejor se reconoce a Maria Elena, que con 51 años de edad tiene su propio taller de confección a terceros, y desde el cual genera los ingresos necesarios para sostener los gastos del hogar donde vive con sus 4 hijos y su esposo. Maria Elena siempre tuvo el sueño de tener su propio negocio y poder contratar a muchas personas necesitadas de ingresos, y ya hace 10 años que lo ha cumplido con su taller, donde contrata a algunas personas por temporadas. Maria Elena aspira a que en un futuro su negocio crezca, se consolide en su región y pueda dejarles una estabilidad económica a sus hijos. Como se avecina la temporada escolar, Maria Elena se prepara para los pedidos que le hacen sus clientes, por lo que comprará insumos para la confección de uniformes.
texts.en: Dedication is one of the words that most identifies with Maria Elena, who at 51 years old has her own sewing shop that generates the necessary income to cover household expenses for her husband and their four children. Maria Elena always had a dream of having her own business and being able to hire many people in need of income, and 10 years ago she fulfilled this dream with her workshop, where she hires some seasonal workers. Maria Elena hopes her business grows in the future to expand its reach in the region and to provide financial stability for her children. As the school season approaches, Maria Elena is preparing her customers' orders, which is why she plans to purchase supplies to make uniforms.

loans.use: to purchase sewing supplies for uniforms.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 37 years old. He is married to Margret and they have 2 children. Samuel has been running a bakery for the last five years, earning a monthly income of KES 6800.

He is applying for his first loan with KADET Ltd in the amount of Kes 20,000. He intends to use the loan to purchase wheat, cooking oil, and yeast for baking. With the anticipated profits, he will diversify into farming.

His hope and dream is to do both the bakery and a farming business.

loans.use: To purchase wheat, yeast, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Scarlet

texts.es: La señora Scarlet se dedica a la comercialización de ropa. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de ropa juvenil y ropa de fiesta para fin de año y así tener más ingresos, pues tiene una buena demanda. Scarlet es casada y tiene dos hijos .Vive en casa en anticrético (anticrético es una figura legal por la cual el dueño de casa y el inquilino hacen un contrato por dos años, por una suma de dinero que es entregada al dueño de casa por adelantado con el compromiso de devolución de dichos dineros al término del contrato) ubicada en la zona de Achachicala de la Ciudad de La Paz. Es la segunda vez que trabaja con Impro y con kiva.
texts.en:
Scarlet sells cloths.  She needs the loan to buy children’s clothes and party cloths for the end of the year.  That way she will have more income; she has good demand.

Scarlet is married and has two children.  She lives in a house with an “anticrédico arrangement (Anticretico is a transaction not available in the U.S. whereby a property owner requests a "loan" from you in exchange for housing, which must be paid back to you at the end of your contract. If your loan is not repaid, the property owner loses the property to you).  She lives in the Achachicala zone in the city of La Paz.

This is the second time that she has worked with Impro and with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy children’s clothes and party cloths to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Nyanchick

texts.en: Nyanchick is a 35-year-old married woman with one child who is not in school. For four years, she has been selling fish in Bor, South Sudan. Nyanchick is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to build a house in the future.

loans.use: to purchase fish to sell.

loans.name: Braulio

texts.es: El señor Braulio es contador y además percibe ingresos de su taxi. El crédito que requiere es para la refacción  de una habitación de una habitación en su casa, pues necesita terminar la obra fina y pintado de la misma. Braulio  es casado  y tiene cuatro hijos. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona  Central  de la Ciudad de La Paz. Es la cuarta vez que trabaja con kiva.
texts.en:
Braulio is an accountant.  He also gets income from his taxi.

He needs the loan to repair a room in his house.  He needs to finish the work and paint the room.

Baulio is married and has four children.  He lives in his own house in the central zone of the city of La Paz.

This is the fourth time he has worked with Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for repairs to a room in his house.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es: El señor  Guillermo tiene como actividad  principal un taller sastrería, confecciona trajes formales para caballeros y damas, su taller esta ubicado en la zona Juana Azurduy de la ciudad de El Alto La Paz, viven con su esposa que es profesora juntos realizan diferentes trabajos, el momento de la visita se encontraba en su taller confeccionando trajes,  esta actividad es su principal fuente de ingreso para ellos, en esta ocasión solicitan financiamiento para la compra de dos maquinas para mejorar su actividad ya que por la demanda de pedidos para la confección de trajes desea contratar mano de obra y le hace falta maquinaria, por este motivo se siente agradecido y feliz con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Guillermo makes a living with his tailoring workshop, sewing formal attire for men and women. His workshop is located in the Juana Azurduy zone in the city of El Alto, and he lives with his wife, who is a teacher. At the time of the picture Guillermo was working in his workshop, which is the main source of income for his family. He is requesting the loan to purchase two sewing machines to increase his output because due to his demand he wants to hire workers and he lacks machinery. He feels thankful and happy for their support.

loans.use: to purchase two sewing machines.

loans.name: Pauline

texts.en:
Pauline is 33 years old. She is married to Waweru, and they have 4 children. She has been practicing dairy farming for the last 11 years, earning a monthly income of KES 2000.

She is applying for her first loan with KADET Ltd in the amount of KES 30,000. She will use the funds to purchase feeds for her dairy cows and fungicides. With the anticipated profits, she will expand her farming business.

Her hope and dream is to venture into large-scale dairy farming.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and fungicides.

loans.name: Nyantiop

texts.en: Nyantiop is a 30-year-old married woman with five children, two of whom are in school. For one year, she has been selling fish in Bor, South Sudan. Nyantiop is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase fish. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay her children's school fees.

loans.use: to purchase fish to sell.

loans.name: Genaro

texts.es: El señor Genaro es chofer de transporte de pasajeros y su esposa es ayudante de ladrillería. El crédito lo solicita para la construcción de una losa en la tercera planta de su domicilio; necesita comprar piedra, arena y cemento y pagar la mano de obra. Genaro  es casado  y tiene cinco  hijos. Vive en casa propia  ubicada en la zona  de Alpacoma  de la Ciudad de La Paz. Es la primera vez que trabaja junto a Impro y Kiva. El análisis de ingresos y egresos da como resultado que Genaro puede acceder a un préstamo.
texts.en:
Genaro is a public transportion driver.  His wife is a brick making helper.

He is requesting to loan to install flooring  on the third floor of his home.  He needs to buy stone, sand, cement, and to pay for the labor.

Genaro is married and has five children.  He lives in his own house in the Alpacoma zone of the city of La Paz.

This is the first time he has worked together with Impro and Kiva.  

The analysis of his income and expenses shows that Genaro qualifies for a loan.

loans.use: to buy stone, sand, and cement to install flooring on the third floor of his house.

loans.name: Jacinta

texts.en:
Jacinta is 38 years old and has two children. She has been selling cereals for the last five years, earning a monthly income of KES 10,500.

She is requesting her first loan with KADET Ltd in the amount of KES 20,000. She will use the funds to purchase stocks of cereals, such as maize and beans, for her business. With the anticipated profits, she will save to diversify into farming.

Her hopes and dreams are to do both her cereals business and dairy farming.

loans.use: to buy stock of cereals such as maize and beans.

loans.name: Gloria Beatriz

texts.es: La señora Gloria Beatriz, a sus 34 años de edad, posee un salón de belleza el cual abrió luego de realizar un curso de la actividad de peluquería tiempo antes. Con la necesidad de generar los ingresos necesarios para el hogar donde convive con sus 2 hijos y su esposo, Gloria Beatriz recurrió a la actividad que la apasiona y con la cual se ha querido generar sus ingresos. En su salón de belleza, Gloria Beatriz tiene una gran reputación por la calidad de sus trabajos, por lo que su clientela es fiel a sus servicios. Con el ánimo de ofrecer mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes, Gloria Beatriz busca comprar insumos para su salón de belleza como son tinturas en diferentes colores, tratamientos para el cabello y shampoo. Gloria Beatriz sueña con que su negocio crezca, se consolide como el mejor de su sector, y pueda contratar a muchas personas que necesiten de ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Gloria Beatriz, 34, has a beauty salon that she opened after taking a hairdressing course some time ago. Needing to earn income for her husband and their two children, Gloria Beatriz turned to an activity that impassioned her. At her salon she has a great reputation for her quality of work, so she has a faithful clientele. With the goal of offering a wider variety of products to her customers, Gloria Beatriz is planning to purchase supplies like different colored dyes, hair treatments for men and shampoo. Her dream is for her business to grow and gain a larger market share so she can hire more people who need income to improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 44 years old. She is married to Ndungu, and they have 4 children. She has been running an agrovet (veterinary and agricultural supplies) business for the last two years, earning a monthly income of KES 8000.

She is applying for her first loan with KADET Ltd in the amount of KES 30,000. She will use the funds to purchase stocks of pesticides, fungicides, and fertilizers for resale. With the anticipated profits, she will expand her agrovet business.

Her hopes and dreams are to grow into a wholesale agrovet business.

loans.use: To purchase pesticides, fungicides, and fertilizer for her agrovet business.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: La Señora Ana tiene  como actividad la venta de peluches y juguetes nuevos, su puesto es ambulante vende en  la feria 16 julio  en la Ciudad de El Alto La Paz, los peluches lo compra por fardos y los vende por unidad, los juguetes los compra por docena y los vende por unidad, la señora tiene a su cargo a tres nietos que dependen de ella donde cuenta que su hija murió, y se hizo cargo de sus nietos, la señora es dueña de casa su domicilio se encuentra ubicado en la zona Santa Vera Cruz, la Sra. Ana tiene buenas referencias por parte de la asesora siendo una clienta antigua de Emprender. En esta ocasión solicita financiamiento para aumentar su capital de negocio, comprara por cantidad juguetes y peluches  y por inicio de año agendas para aumentar  sus ingresos y así de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana makes a living selling new toys and stuffed animals. She has an outdoor sales post at a trade-fair market in the city of El Alto. She buys the toys and stuffed animals in bulk and sells them individually. She has three grandchildren under her care who have depended on her since their mother, her daughter, died. Ana owns a home in the Santa Vera Cruz area of the city. As a longtime client of Kiva partner Emprender, she has good references from the loan assessor. At this time she is requesting a loan to increase her working capital to purchase a quantity of toys and stuffed animals for the start of the year to increase her income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase toys and stuffed animals.

loans.name: Refaa

texts.en: Refaa, a 60-year-old housewife married to Ali, has a fruit and vegetable shop. With the help of her husband, who has access to fresh vegetables, Refaa makes different types of pickles from cucumbers, olives, thyme and more. She even makes frozen veggies based on the season. Now Refaa has applied for a loan to expand her business and open her own store, where she can take more orders for homemade pickles and frozen vegetables for cooking.

loans.use: to open her own store where she can take more orders for homemade pickles and frozen vegetables

loans.name: Sofia

texts.en: Sofia is a 48-year-old married woman. She has 3 children whose ages range from 24 years to 26 years. She describes herself as responsible and jovial. She operates a retail store where she sells charcoal. She has been involved in this business for 7 years. Her business is located in a residential area. She describes her biggest business challenge as shortages of charcoal due to government restrictions on the cutting of trees for charcoal production. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more charcoal. Sofia's business goal is to be a large-scale supplier of charcoal within 5 years.

loans.use: To buy more charcoal to sell.

loans.name: Emmilly

texts.en: Emmily is a married woman. She has 2 children, aged 2 years and 7 years. She describes herself as hardworking. She operates a food stall where she sells food. She has been involved in this business for 1 year. Her business is located in a viable environment. She describes her biggest business challenge as disturbances by the city council. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more ingredients for making food. Emmily's business goal is to run a big hotel (restaurant) within 5 years.

loans.use: To buy more ingredients for making food to sell.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “QORIMANCACHA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Francisca; ella tiene 52 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende arroz, azúcar, aceite, leche y fideos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar arroz, azúcar, leche y fideos al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Francisca belongs to the “QORIMANCACHA” community bank located in the district, province and department of Cusco. She is 52 years old, married and has four children. She divides her household activities with her grocery store business, selling rice, sugar, oil, milk and noodles. She works from 8 a.m. until 10 p.m. The business helps make headway for her children, which is why Francisca wants to expand it. She is requesting the loan to purchase rice, sugar, milk and noodles at wholesale. She feels happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy wholesale rice, sugar, milk, and noodles.

loans.name: Anyela Yuliana

texts.es:
Anyela Yuliana vive en Camaná, Perú, un oasis en el otro modo de largo y seco desierto de Sechura que domina la costa en la parte sudoeste del país. Camaná ha sido históricamente un importante destino turístico en el Perú, sin embargo, los frecuentes y fuertes terremotos y tsunamis en la última década (un 8,4 en 2001 y 8,0 en 2007) diezmó la ciudad, destruido la industria del turismo en Camaná, y costando muchos de sus puestos de trabajo, los medios de subsistencia, y los hogares. En sus tiempos libres disfruta mucho de pasear por las hermosas playas de camana sobre todo porque la relaja mucho, comop el Peru es un país de una gastronomía exquisita a Anyela le gusta mucho El Ceviche, ella es profesora de matematicas, y nos comenta que de niña no le gustaba para nada, es por ello que cuando enseña a sus alumnos lo hace con mucha paciencia.

Anyela trabaja dictando clases particulares de matematica, trabaja alrededor de 5 horas diarias y enseña alrededor de 12 alumnos por días, en un dia puede ganar hasta S/. 50 pero en un dia muy bueno puede ganar hasta S/.84 pero ella nos dice que aveces da facilidades a los padres de sus alumnos porque mas que todo ella quiere que los niños aprendan y estén bien en la escuela, ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque tiene mucha paciencia con los alumnos y porque los padres le tienen mucha confianza.

Anyela esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias su auda ella podrá comprar sillas y muebles para dictar sus clases, esta mejora permitira que sus alumnos estén mas comodos y poder tener más alumnos que enseñar, asi podrá tenr mas ingresos y ahorrar para cumplir su mas grande sueño:” Tener su casa propia”.
texts.en:
Anyela Yuliana lives in Camaná, Peru, which is an oasis in the otherwise long and dry desert of Sechura that dominates the southwestern part of the country. Camaná has historically been an important tourist destination in Peru, however, the frequent and strong earthquakes and tsunamis during the last decade (8.4 in 2001 and 8.0 in 2007) destroyed the tourism business in Camaná, with the loss of many jobs, ways of making a living, and homes.

In her free time she very much enjoys walking the beautiful beaches of Camaná, most of all because it is very relaxing. Peru is a country with delicious food and Anyela likes ceviche a lot. She is a professor of mathematics, and tells us that as a child she didn’t like it at all, and this is why when she is teaching her students she does it with a lot of patience.

Anyela provides private math classes, working around 5 hours daily and teaching around 12 students per day. In a day she can earn up to S/.50 but in a good day she can earn up to S/.84 but she tells us that sometimes she makes it easier for the parents of her students because most of all she wants her students to learn and do well in school. She thinks that things are going well in her business because she has a lot of patience with the students and because the parents have a lot of confidence in her.

Anyela is very grateful as a Kiva borrower and thanks to the help she can buy chairs and furniture in order to teach her classes. This enhancement will permit her students to be more comfortable and for her to have more students to teach, and thus she can have more income and savings in order to fulfill her biggest dream, “having her own home.”

loans.use: to buy chairs and furniture for her classes

loans.name: Mariamu

texts.en:
Mariamu is a married woman. She has a son who is one year old. She describes herself as honest. 

Mariamu operates a retail store where she sells firewood. She has been involved in this business for one year. Her business is located in a viable environment. She describes her biggest business challenge as the scarcity of firewood. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more firewood. Mariamu's business goal is to expand her business within five years.

loans.use: To buy more firewood for selling.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.es: La Señora Wilma tiene  como actividad la venta de variedad de productos de manera ambulante vende entregando productos a crédito desde abarrotes, electrodomésticos, por distintas zonas, en los mercados, tiene ya clientas que le hacen variedad de pedidos y la Sra. Compra y les entrega y cada mes o cada quincena cobra   En esta ocasión solicita financiamiento para aumentar su capital de negocio, comprara por cantidad abarrotes  y por inicio de año electrodomésticos  para aumentar  sus ingresos y así de esta manera mejorar su calidad de vid, la Sra. Wilma es una persona muy trabajadora se siente muy agradecida con la institución ya que esta es su única fuente de ingresos ya que gracias a su apoyo salió adelante en su negocio, diversificando su productos.
texts.en: Wilma makes a living selling a variety of products as a roaming merchant. She sells products from groceries to household appliances on credit in distinct areas and markets. She has customers who make a number of orders and she buys and delivers the products every month or 15 days. She is requesting the loan to increase her working capital to purchase a supply of groceries and to start the year with appliances to increase her income and improve her quality of life. Wilma is a very hard-working person who feels very grateful for Kiva partner Emprender because this business is her only source of income and thanks to the support she has made headway and diversified her products.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of wholesale products to sell.

loans.name: Mujeres Emprendedoras 2 Group

texts.es:
Este grupo surgió por contacto de una de las integrantes con la Fundación,  el grupo se encuentra en el noveno ciclo, opera con la Fundación desde el año 2008.
Una de las integrantes del grupo es la Sra. Ramona, ella tiene 4 hijos , está acompañada con el Sr. Juan y nos cuenta que  ella se dedica hace varios años a la venta de ropas, gracias a lo cual puede ayudar en la casa y a su marido a poder compartir los gastos del día a día. Ella se define como una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora que se esfuerza por su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de verano, ya que estamos en esa época y tiene muchas ventas. Agradece a la fundación y a kiva por la oportunidad que estas le dan.
texts.en: This group came together after contacting a member of Fundación Paraguaya and is now on its ninth loan cycle with the institution since 2008. One of the members is Ramona. She and her husband Juan have four children, and she has made a living selling clothing for a number of years, thanks to which she can help her family and share day-to-day expenses with her husband. She is known as a high-spirited woman who works very hard for her family. She is requesting the loan to purchase summer clothing, since it is currently that time of year and she has a lot of sales. She thanks Fundación Paraguaya and Kiva for the opportunity they are providing.

loans.use: to purchase summer clothes to later sell.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
Santiago tiene 27 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, él se dedica a la construcción de casas y obras. 

Santiago pertenece al banco comunal “Mercaditos de Patria” de la ciudad de Patria. Ya son seis años que trabaja con la Asociación Arariwa y le va muy bien. Las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Patria de la provincia de Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco. Desde la ciudad del Cusco a nuestro destino hay una distancia de 200 Km. (aproximado nueve horas de viaje) hasta llegar a la localidad de Patria. Durante el viaje cruzaremos parte de la cordillera andina Peruana, observaremos hermosos valles interandinos, comunidades indígenas andinas quechuas y camino a la Reserva de Biosfera del Parque Nacional del Manu. 

En esta oportunidad Santiago requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción como por ejemplo cementos, ladrillos y otras cosas más. 
    
Santiago agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Santiago is 27 years old and has a common-law union from which he has two children.  He works in construction on houses and buildings.

Santiago belongs to the communal bank "Mercaditos de Patria" in the city of Patria.  He has worked with the Association Araiwa for six years already and it is going very well for him.  The meetings of the members of the communal bank are once a month in the city of Patria, in the province of Paucartambo, in the department of Cusco.  From the city of Cusco to our destination is a distance of 200 kilometers (approximately nine hours of travel) to arrive in the town of Patria.  During the trip we cross part of the Andes mountain range.  We observe beautiful inter-Andean valleys, Andean Quechua indigenous communities, and the path to the Biosphere Reserves of the National Park of Manu.

In this opportunity, Santiago requests the loan to buy construction materials such as cement, bricks, and other items.

Santiago is thankful for and values the loan.  He promises to follow through with the payments of his monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy construction materials such as cement, bricks, and other items.

loans.name: Bibi

texts.en: Bibi is a 42-year-old married woman. She has two children, 9 and 21 years old. She describes herself as honest, responsible, committed, and quiet. She operates rental houses and provides services related to them. She has been involved in this business for two years. Her business is located in a viable environment. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to pay for the furnishing of the houses. Bibi's business goal is to construct more rental houses within five years.

loans.use: To pay for the furnishing of her rental houses.

loans.name: Bertha

texts.es: La señora   Bertha  se dedica a la venta de comida en un restaurante que se encuentra en una zona comercial de la zona el tejar,  es separada de su esposo y tiene  dos hijos que están en la edad universitaria, anteriormente trabajo en grupo solidario" Leo" demostrando puntualidad y mucha responsabilidad es madre sola que con el negocio de su pensión saca adelante a sus hijos,  el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de un refrigerador y  abarrotes, la  cliente se siente  muy feliz y agradecida de seguir trabajando con la institución ya que gracias a su apoyo salió adelante y creció en su negocio, el deseo de la Sra. Bertha el de ver a sus hijos profesionales y de esta manera mejorar la calidad de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Mrs. Bertha sells food at a restaurant in a commercial zone of the Tejar area.  She is divorced and has two university-aged children.  In the past she belonged to the communal bank "Leo" and demonstrated punctuality and responsibility as a single mother who, through her food business, was able to provide for her children.

She plans to use the loan to buy a refrigerator and groceries.  She is very content and grateful to continue working with the institution which has given her support to get ahead and grow her business.  

Mrs. Bertha's goal is to see her children become professionals so the family's quality of life can improve.

loans.use: To buy a small refrigerator and groceries.

loans.name: Marciana

texts.es: la Sra. Marciana  se dedica a la venta de repuestos para vehículos como ser muñones, juntas, ponchillos, cremalleras, grasas y otros, el esposo de la Sra. es mecánico y trabaja al frente de la tienda el cual esta ubicado en la zona de tembladerani en donde existen varios talleres de mecánica por lo que la venta es buena ya que tiene mucha clientela,  el crédito solicitado estará destinado al incremento de capital (compra de repuestos para vehículos), gracias a la visita que le realizamos pudimos observar que la Sra. tiene su tienda en un lugar estratégico el cual genera buenas utilidades por lo que asegura que será puntual en el pago de sus cuotas ya que es un apersona es responsable y trabajadora se siente muy feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Mrs. Marciana sells vehicle spare parts, such as pivots, covers, racks, lubricants and other items.  Her husband is a mechanic and works across from the shop which is located in the area of Tembladerani where there are several mechanical workshops.  Therefore sales are good and she has many customers.

The loan she is requesting will be used to increase working capital to buy vehicle spare parts.  Through our visit we were able to observe that Marciana's shop is in a strategic, useful location which ensures that she will be punctual in her loan payments because she is responsible and hard-working.  She is content and grateful to the institution for the support received.

loans.use: To increase working capital to buy spare parts.

loans.name: Franklin

texts.es:
Franklin tiene 18 años de edad y es soltero y aun no tiene hijos, él se dedica a la construcción de casas y obras. 

Franklin pertenece al banco comunal “Mercaditos de Patria” de la ciudad de Patria. Ya son varios años que trabaja con la Asociación Arariwa y le va muy bien. Las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Patria de la provincia de Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco. Desde la ciudad del Cusco a nuestro destino hay una distancia de 200 Km. (aproximado nueve horas de viaje) hasta llegar a la localidad de Patria. Durante el viaje cruzaremos parte de la cordillera andina Peruana, observaremos hermosos valles interandinos, comunidades indígenas andinas quechuas y camino a la Reserva de Biosfera del Parque Nacional del Manu. 

En esta oportunidad Franklin requiere el préstamo para comprar materiales de construcción como por ejemplo ladrillos, cementos y otras cosas más. Su sueño de Franklin es comprarse una casa. 

Franklin agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Franklin, 18, is single and has no children.  He works in construction of houses and other projects.

Franklin belongs to the communal bank "Mercaditos de Patria" in the city of Patria.  He has worked with the Arariwa Association for many years and it has gone well for him.  The meetings of the members of the communal bank take place monthly in Patria in the province of Paucartambo, department of Cusco.  From the city of Cusco to Patria there is a distance of 200 Km. (approximately nine hours of travel).  During the trip we cross part of the Peruvian Andes and we see beautiful interandean valleys, Andean Quechuan indian communites and the trail to the Manu National Park Biosphere Reserve.

On this occasion, Franklin is requesting a loan to buy construction materials such as bricks, cement and other items.  His dream is to buy a house.

Franklin is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy construction materials such as bricks, cement and other items.

loans.name: Editha Ysabel

texts.es: La Sra. Editha  vive en la zona 27 de Mayo,  ella se dedica a la venta de comida desde aproximadamente 3 años, su esposo trabaja en una fábrica de azúcar,  tienen un hijo de dos años y medio. Este es su tercer crédito que están solicitando en la institución donde demostrado un buen comportamiento de pago, Este nuevo crédito que están solicitando es para aumentar su capital de trabajo comprando insumos para la elaboración de sus riquísimos platillos,  ya que ha aumentado su clientela,  la Sra. Editha es una mujer responsable, trabajadora y con muchas ganas de superación para darle un futuro a su hija y a su familia, se siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Mrs. Editha lives in the "27 de Mayo" area where she has been in the food business for approximately three years.  Her husband works at a sugar factory and they have a son who is two and a half years old.  This is her third loan through the institution where she has a good credit record.  The new loan she is requesting is to increase her working capital to buy ingredients to make her delicious dishes, since her customer base has increased.

Editha is a responsible, hard-working woman who is determined to get ahead so she can give her son and family a better future.  She is grateful to the institution for the support received.

loans.use: To buy ingredients for her food business.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
Lucia tiene 49 años de edad y tiene seis hijos, ella se dedica al comercio a la venta de abarrotes, venta de comida y también se dedica a la agricultura. 

Lucia pertenece al banco comunal “Mercaditos de Patria” de la ciudad de Patria. Ya son varios años que trabaja con la Asociación Arariwa y le va muy bien. Las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Patria de la provincia de Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco. Desde la ciudad del Cusco a nuestro destino hay una distancia de 200 Km. (aproximado nueve horas de viaje) hasta llegar a la localidad de Patria. Durante el viaje cruzaremos parte de la cordillera andina Peruana, observaremos hermosos valles interandinos, comunidades indígenas andinas quechuas y camino a la Reserva de Biosfera del Parque Nacional del Manu. 

En esta oportunidad Lucia requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar y otras cosas más. Su sueño de Lucia es comprarse una casa grande.   

Lucia agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Lucia, 49, has six children.  She has a grocery store and also works in agriculture.

Lucia belongs to the communal bank "Mercaditos de Patria" in the city of Patria.  She has been working with the Arariwa Association for several years and it has gone well for her. The meetings of the members of the communal bank take place monthly in Patria in the province of Paucartambo, department of Cusco. From the city of Cusco to Patria there is a distance of 200 Km. (approximately nine hours of travel). During the trip we cross part of the Peruvian Andes and we see beautiful interandean valleys, Andean Quechuan indian communites and the trail to the Manu National Park Biosphere Reserve.

On this occasion Lucia is requesting a loan to buy goods such as rice, sugar and other items.  Her dream is to buy a large house.

Lucia is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy goods such as rice, sugar and other items.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: El señor Juan  tiene como actividad  principal la elaboración de derivados lácteos, diario compra 25 litros de leche y de su propio ganado lechero produce 10 litros de leche, su laboratorio es en su casa propia, ubicado en plena avenida camino a Copacabana,   viven con su esposa que se encarga en la venta de yogurts, el momento de la visita se encontraba con su esposa en su laboratorio lavando sus baldes,  esta actividad es su principal fuente de ingreso para ellos, en esta ocasión solicitan financiamiento para la compra de una lechera de raza mejorada para tener mas cantidad de leche y de esta manera mejorar sus  ingresos, ambos trabajan muy fuerte por el bienestar de su familia, se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Juan's main activity is making dairy products. He buys 25 liters of milk every day and his own dairy cattle produce 10 liters of milk. His laboratory is in his own house, located right in the Camino a Copacabana avenue. He lives with his wife, who is in charge of selling yogurt. At the time of his visit, he was with his wife in the laboratory washing his pails. This activity is their main source of income. At this time, they are asking for a loan to buy a purebred dairy cow in order to have more milk and thus increase their income. They both work very hard for their family's wellbeing. He is grateful to the institution for the support offered.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy yarn and dye in order to weave

loans.name: Rosa Luz

texts.es:
Rosa Luz tiene 42 años de edad, tiene tres hijos y vive en la ciudad de Patria, ella se dedica al comercio osea tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes y a la agricultura. 

Rosa Luz pertenece al banco comunal “Mercaditos de Patria” de la ciudad de Patria. Ya son seis años que trabaja con la Asociación Arariwa y le va muy bien. Las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Patria de la provincia de Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco. Desde la ciudad del Cusco a nuestro destino hay una distancia de 200 Km. (aproximado nueve horas de viaje) hasta llegar a la localidad de Patria. Durante el viaje cruzaremos parte de la cordillera andina Peruana, observaremos hermosos valles interandinos, comunidades indígenas andinas quechuas y camino a la Reserva de Biosfera del Parque Nacional del Manu. 

En esta oportunidad Rosa Luz requiere el préstamo para mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar y otras cosas y desea comprar semillas, abono y otras cosas más. Su sueño Rosa Luz de es ampliar el negocio.   

Rosa Luz agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Rosa Luz is 42 years old. She has three children and lives in the city of Patria. She is a merchant, that is to say she has a little store selling groceries and farm supplies. 

Rosa belongs to the communal bank "Mercaditos de Patria" from the city of Patria. She has been with the Asociación Arariwa for six years and it is going very well. The communal bank meeting takes place every thirty days in the city of Patria in the province of Paucartambo in the department of Cusco. From the city of Cusco our destination is a distance of 200 km (approximately a nine hour trip) until arriving at Patria. During the trip we cross part of the Andes Mountains of Peru where we see beautiful valleys, indigenous Quechua communities, and the road to the Biosphere Reserve in the Manu National Park.

At this time Rosa Luz is asking for a loan to buy supplies such as, for example, bags of rice, sacks of flour, and other items like seeds, fertilizer and more. Rosa's dream is to expand her business. Rosa Luz is grateful, and values the loan, and promises to make her monthly payments on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as, for example, bags of rice, sacks of flour, and other items like seeds, fertilizer and more

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es:
Doña Blanca tiene 44 años de edad, es madre soltera de 3 hijos y se dedica al comercio, su actividad principal es la venta golosinas, desayunos y almuerzos.  Su negocio opera en su casa de habitación, ahi mismo vende cosméticos y joyeria a los clientes que la visitan.
Blanca utilizara el credito para comprar alimentos para preparar sus deliciosas comidas, tambien desea comprar una freidora de pollo.
su meta es darles un buen estudio a sus hijos para que sean buenos profesionales y personas de bien.
Blanca cuenta con dos ayudantes para la elaboracion de sus comidas.
texts.en:
Blanca is 44 years old, a single mother of three children and has a business with her main activity being selling sweets, breakfasts and lunches.

She has her business at home where she lives, and right there she sells cosmetics and jewelry to her clients when they visit.

Blanca will use her loan to buy food in order to prepare her delicious food. Also she wants to buy a deep-fat fryer for chicken.

Her goal is to give her children a good education so they become good professionals and good people. 

Blanca has the help of two assistants to prepare the food.

loans.use: to buy a deep-fat fryer, beef, pork and chicken, vegetables, condiments, oil, butter, beans, tortillas, soft drinks, disposable plates and cups, eggs, sausages, rice, water, produce and dairy products

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
Rosa tiene 29 años de edad, tiene dos hijos y vive en la ciudad de Patria, ella se dedica al comercio y a la agricultura. 

Rosa pertenece al banco comunal “Mercaditos de Patria” de la ciudad de Patria. Ya son cuatro años que trabaja con la Asociación Arariwa y le va muy bien. Las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Patria de la provincia de Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco. Desde la ciudad del Cusco a nuestro destino hay una distancia de 200 Km. (aproximado nueve horas de viaje) hasta llegar a la localidad de Patria. Durante el viaje cruzaremos parte de la cordillera andina Peruana, observaremos hermosos valles interandinos, comunidades indígenas andinas quechuas y camino a la Reserva de Biosfera del Parque Nacional del Manu. 

En esta oportunidad Rosa requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas, abono y otras cosas más. Su sueño de Rosa es ampliar el negocio. Su sueño de Rosa es comprar un carro. 

Rosa agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Rosa is 29 years old, has two children and lives in the city of Patria. She is works in commerce and agriculture.

Rosa belongs to the communal bank "Mercaditos de Patria" from the city of Patria. She has been with the Asociación Arariwa for four years and it is going very well. The communal bank meeting takes place every thirty days in the city of Patria in the province of Paucartambo in the department of Cusco. From the city of Cusco our destination is a distance of 200 km (approximately a nine hour trip) until arriving at Patria. During the trip we cross part of the mountain ranges of the Andes of Peru, where we see beautiful valleys, indigenous Quechua communities, and the road to the Biosphere Reserve in the Manu National Park.

Rosa is at this time asking for a loan in order to buy seed, fertilizer and other items. Rosa’s dream is to expand her business; her dream is to buy a car.

Rosa is grateful, and values the loan, and she promises to make her monthly payments on time.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer, and other items

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora Maria  es casada, tiene 40 años de edad, cursó el tercer año de educación primaria, tiene 5 hijos, 3 de los cuales estan estudiando, se dedica a la producción de pantalones y faldas, inició este negocio como operaria y hasta el momento lleva 16 años de experiencia, cuanta con el apoyo de su esposo qu9ien hace el mismo trabajo.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de materiales consistente en telas e hilos y mejorar su producción de pantalones y faldas, telas de lonas, gabardina, telas lamina. Espera incrementar el numero de trabajadores con los que tiene.
texts.en:
Maria is married, 40 years old, and studied through the third year of primary school. She has five children, three of whom are students. She works making pants and skirts. She began this business as a loom operator and so far has sixteen years of experience, and has the support of her husband who does the same work. 

She is asking for a loan in order to buy some supplies such as fabric and yarn to improve her production of pants and skirts, tarpaulins, raincoats, and fabrics for laminating. She hopes to increase the amount of work that she gets.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread to make pants and skirts

loans.name: Mario Roberto

texts.es:
Don Mario tiene 48 años de edad, vive en unión libre y tiene 3 hijos, Mario se dedica al comercio, su actividad principal es la venta de comidas como ser golosinas, desayunos y almuerzos, su negocio esta bien ubicado ya que por esa zona transitan muchas personas que viven en zonas aledañas montañosas y lo prefieren ya que sus comidas son muy sabrosas y tambien los precios son accesibles para dicha comunidad.
don Mario utilizara el credito para comprar mesas, sillas, manteles y utencilios de cocina, asi podra dar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, que se sientan mas cómodos al ingresar a consumir a su negocio.
las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con su familia.
don mario tiene una ayudante para preparar las comidas y atender a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Sr. Mario is 48 years old, lives with his partner, and has three children. He runs a food business selling candy, breakfasts, and lunches. His business is well-located as it is in an area where lots of people who live in the nearby mountains pass through. They like his food as it’s very tasty and the prices are affordable.

Mario will use the loan money to buy tables, chairs, tablecloths, and cooking utensils so that he will be able to provide a better service to his customers. They will feel more comfortable when they come to eat the food he makes. Mario needs to earn more money so that he and his family can get ahead. He has an assistant to help him prepare the food and serve the customers.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, tablecloths, and cooking utensils

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La señora María es de la ciudad de Concepción, viven en la casa de su tia con su mama hace más de 6 años, cuidan la casa de su tía, ya que esta esta trabajando en Argentina.
La señora María tiene su  negocio de ventas de mercería hace más de 2 años,  su mama tiene una verdulería, tiene su puesto en el mercado municipal. Comenta que gracias a su mercería donde vende todo tipo de productos, como ser zapatillas, ropas, artículos para regalos y demás, ha podido ayudar en los gastos del día a día y salir adelante.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de zapatillas, prendas, artículos para regalos y demás productos, con lo cual podrá tener más variedad para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Sra. María is from the town of Concepción. She and her mother have lived in her aunt’s house for more than six months. They look after the house while her aunt is away working in Argentina.

María has had a stall for over two years in the local market; her  mother runs a fruit and vegetable stall. María is grateful to have her stall where she sells products such as shoes, clothing, and gift ware, as she has been able to cover daily expenses as well as make progress in life. She is seeking a loan to buy shoes, clothing, giftware and other products so that she’ll have a greater variety to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy shoes, clothing, giftware etc.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
Lucia tiene 31 años de edad, tiene cuatro hijos y vive en la ciudad de Patria, ella se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería. 

Lucia pertenece al banco comunal “Mercaditos de Patria” de la ciudad de Patria. Ya son seis años que trabaja con la Asociación Arariwa y le va muy bien. Las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Patria de la provincia de Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco. Desde la ciudad del Cusco a nuestro destino hay una distancia de 200 Km. (aproximado nueve horas de viaje) hasta llegar a la localidad de Patria. Durante el viaje cruzaremos parte de la cordillera andina Peruana, observaremos hermosos valles interandinos, comunidades indígenas andinas quechuas y camino a la Reserva de Biosfera del Parque Nacional del Manu. 

En esta oportunidad Lucia requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas, abono y otras cosas más. Su sueño de Lucia es comprar una casa.  

Lucia agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
31-year old Lucia has four children and lives in the town of Patria. She works on a farm and also raises animals. She belongs to the local community bank called the Mercaditos de Patria and has worked with the Asociación Arariwa for six years. All is going well. The members of the bank meet every month in Patria, which is located in the province of Paucartambo, in the department of Cusco. From Patria to the town of Cusco is about 200 km (a journey of approximately nine hours). During the trip you cross the Peruvian Andes and can see beautiful valleys, Quechuan communities, and the road to the Reserva de Biosfera in the Manu National Park. 

Lucia requires a loan to buy seeds, fertilizer etc. Her dream is to buy a house. She is grateful for the valuable loan and promises to pay the monthly installments.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer etc.

loans.name: Elman Armando

texts.es:
El señor Elman Armando es casado, tiene 20 años de experiencia, cursó sus estudios de 5 perito contador, se dedica a la construcción de vivienda, lleva 3 año de experiencia ene este trabajo, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa quien se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de ropa, ya que quiere apertura este negocios de venta de ropa, compra de playeras, suéteres, sudaderos, blusas, etc. Espera tener un negocio estable y funcional.
texts.en:
Elman Armando is married and has 20 years of experience.  He completed his studies as an accountant.  He works in home construction, and has 3 years of experience at this job.  He counts on the support of his wife, who takes care of the domestic tasks.

He is requesting a loan that he will use for purchasing clothes, since he wants to open a clothing sales business.  He will buy T-shirts, sweaters, sweatshirts, blouses, etc.  He hopes to have a stable and functional business.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for merchandise.

loans.name: Marcia Esmeregilda

texts.es:
Doña Marcia tiene 34 años de edad, esta casada y es madre de 2 hijos, Marcia se dedica al comercio,  su principal actividad es la venta de abarrotería (Pulpería) cuenta con más de 5 años de experiencia en la  administración del mismo, la Sra. Marcia ha sabido ganarse su clientela por la atención que les brinda y por los precios que les ofrece.
Ella utilizara el credito para comprar productos de la canasta básica como ser: Arroz, Frijoles, Maíz, manteca, azúcar, jabones, carnes, productos lácteos,  etc.  esto para tener mas variedad y ofrecerles a sus clientes productos de calidad.
las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Marcia is 34 years old, married, and has two children.  She is a retailer and her main business is selling groceries.  She has a grocery store and has five years experience running her business.  Marcia has known how to attract customers through the service that she provides and the prices that she offers.

Marcia will use her loan to buy basic household products such as rice, beans, corn, butter, sugar, soap, meat, dairy products, etc. so that she has more variety and can offer her customers good-quality products.  She needs the profits from her business to support her family.

loans.use: to buy groceries, dairy products, basic grains, soft drinks, juices and bread

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth tiene 25 años de edad, tiene tres hijos y vive en la ciudad de Patria, ella se dedica al comercio y a la agricultura. 

Elizabeth pertenece al banco comunal “Mercaditos de Patria” de la ciudad de Patria. Ya es un año que trabaja con la Asociación Arariwa y le va muy bien. Las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Patria de la provincia de Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco. Desde la ciudad del Cusco a nuestro destino hay una distancia de 200 Km. (aproximado nueve horas de viaje) hasta llegar a la localidad de Patria. Durante el viaje cruzaremos parte de la cordillera andina Peruana, observaremos hermosos valles interandinos, comunidades indígenas andinas quechuas y camino a la Reserva de Biosfera del Parque Nacional del Manu. 

En esta oportunidad Elizabeth requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas, abono y otras cosas más. Su sueño de Elizabeth es comprar una casa.  

Elizabeth agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Elizabeth is 25 years old, has three children, and lives in the city of Patria.  She works in business and in agriculture.  Elizabeth belongs to the Mercaditos de Patria communal bank in the city of Patria.  It has already been a year that she has been working with Asociación Arariwa, and it is going very well for her.  The meetings of the members of the communal bank are once a month in the city of Patria in the province of Paucartambo in the department of Cusco.

From the city of Cusco to our destination is a distance of 200 kilometers (a trip of approximately nine hours) to arrive at the town of Patria.  During the trip we will cross part of the highlands of the Peruvian Andes, we will observe pretty interandean valles [dry valleys], indigenous Andean Quechua communities, and the road to the biosphere reserve in Manu National Park.

Right now Elizabeth needs the loan to buy seeds, fertilizer, and other things.  Elizabeth's dream is to buy a house.

Elizabeth is grateful for and values the loan, and she is committed to making the monthly payments on time.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, and other things.

loans.name: Las Azucenas Group

texts.es: La Sra. America, tiene 3 hijos  es casada y lleva trabajando con Edaprospo desde hace 3 año y medio junto al grupo “Las Azucenas”, grupo conformado por 7 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. America trabaja en una bulcanizadora es decir ella tiene su propio taller donde  reparan llantas,este negocio surge con la idea de apoyar a su esposo ya que el es taxista, para poder sacar adelante a sus hijos ambos trabajaron muy duro, este negocio ya tiene 12 años, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a  logrado educacion para sus hijos, se compro terrenos en Huancayo y su familia cuenta con una mejor calidad de vida,con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para mantenimiento y mejorar su negocio de llantas. Sabemos que America cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los prestamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
América has three children and is married.  She has been working with EDAPROSPO for three years along with the Las Azucenas group, made up of seven members who work in various business activities.

América works in a repair shop.  That is, she has her own shop where they repair tires.  This business came from the idea of helping her husband, since he is a taxi driver.  They both worked very hard to be able to get their children ahead.  This business is already 12 years old.  Thanks to her effort and dedication she has achieved education for her children.  She bought land in Huancayo and her family has a better quality of life.

With the goal of continuing to grow she has requested a new loan to maintain and improve her tire business.  We know that América will achieve her goals with a lot of work and effort, and that the EDAPROSPO loans will help her.

loans.use: to maintain her tire shop.

loans.name: Maria Gabriela

texts.es: Maria Gabriela tiene un pequeño negocio propio el cual le permite pagar sus estudios universitarios, pero para pagar el curso de finalización de estudios está solicitando este préstamo debido a que tiene un alto costo. Ella está estudiando Relaciones Internacionales. Ella se ve en un futuro trabajando en una embajada o en la cancillería de la república. Su fuente de inspiración son su familia, su madre que ha sido su pilar en la vida. Quieren poner en alto su país. Uno de sus mayores obstáculos fue el no contar con el apoyo de su papá.
texts.en: María Gabriela has a small business of her own that allows her to pay for her university studies.  She is requesting this loan to pay for the high cost of the final course in her studies.  She is studying international relations.  In the future she sees herself working in an embassy or in the nation's state department.  Her source of inspiration is her family, her mother who has been her pillar in life.  She wants to lift up her country.  One of her greatest obstacles was not having the support of her father.

loans.use: to pay for the thesis course for her university studies.

loans.name: Daniel Fernando

texts.es:
El señora Daniel Fernando es casado, tiene 24 años de edad, cursó el segundo grado de educación básica, trabaja en una organización de servicios profesionales, lleva 3 años de experiencia.

El trabaja como agente de créditos para una organización y por necesidades de su familia, solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de comida para su hogar: cereales, azúcar, lácteos, frutas, etc., espera recuperarse económicamente y darle una mejor condición de vida su familia.
texts.en:
Daniel Fernando is married.  He is 24 years old and studied up to the second year of 'educación básica' (middle school).  He works for a professional services organization and has three years experience.

Daniel Fernando works as a loan agent for an organization.  Owing to the needs of his family, he is requesting a loan which he will use to buy food for his household: cereals, sugar, dairy products, fruit, etc.  He hopes to get back on his feet financially and provide his family with better living conditions.

loans.use: to cover some personal expenses

loans.name: Antonia

texts.es:
Antonia tiene 28 años de edad, tiene dos hijos y vive en la ciudad de Patria, ella se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería. 

Antonia pertenece al banco comunal “Mercaditos de Patria” de la ciudad de Patria. Ya son dos años que trabaja con la Asociación Arariwa y le va muy bien. Las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Patria de la provincia de Paucartambo del departamento del Cusco. Desde la ciudad del Cusco a nuestro destino hay una distancia de 200 Km. (aproximado nueve horas de viaje) hasta llegar a la localidad de Patria. Durante el viaje cruzaremos parte de la cordillera andina Peruana, observaremos hermosos valles interandinos, comunidades indígenas andinas quechuas y camino a la Reserva de Biosfera del Parque Nacional del Manu. 

En esta oportunidad Antonia requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas, abono y otras cosas más. Su sueño de Antonia es comprar una casa y abrir una tienda de abarrotes.  

Antonia agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Antonia is 28, has two children, and lives in the city of Patria. She does agricultural work and raises cattle. Antonia belongs to the "Mercaditos de Patria" communal bank in Patria. She has been working with Asociación Arariwa for two years now, and it's going very well. The meetings for members of the communal bank are held once a month in Patria, which is in Paucartambo Province in the department of Cusco. 

From Cusco to get to Patria it is a distance of 200 km (approximately nine hours of travel). During the trip the traveler crosses part of the foothills of the Peruvian Andes, seeing along the way beautiful mountain valleys, indigenous Andean Quechua communities, and the road to the Biosphere Reserve in Manu National Park. 

At this time Antonia needs a loan to purchase seeds, manure and other items. Her dream is to buy a house and open a grocery store. Antonia appreciates and values the loan and promises to make her monthly payments.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, manure and other items.

loans.name: María Susana

texts.es:
María es una joven de 24 años soltera que vive junto a su madre Isabel de 65 años en la parroquia de "Andrade Marín" en "Atuntaqui" que es una ciudad de 21 000 habitantes que pertenece a la provincia de "Imbabura", al norte de Ecuador. El nombre propio es Antonio Ante pero todos lo conocen como Atuntaqui. Este sector es reconocido por sus fábricas de textiles las cuales representan la mayor parte del movimiento económico de la ciudad. Además su comida típica es muy apetecida ya que aquí se preparan las mejores "fritadas", que se hacen a base de carne de cerdo y son acompañadas por productos de la zona como papas y "mote" (producto hecho de maíz)

Esta emprendedora inició hace un año su propio negocio que es la crianza de cuyes para luego venderlos. Este oficio lo aprendió de su madre. Ella aporta económicamente a su humilde hogar. Ahora se proyecta a crecer (ya que la demanda de este animal lo permite) y para ello necesita un crédito y poder comprar más cuyes y al venderlos para obtener más ganancias. Fundación Alternativa que es la institución que intermediará este crédito, le brindará a María, capacitación y asesoría de tal manera que su negocio pueda crecer de una manera sostenible. Un dato interesante de esta actividad es que en el Ecuador estos animalitos son vendidos como alimento, más no para mascota como se lo hace en otros países.

A pesar de dedicarse de lleno a esta actividad su sueño es tener una panadería. Nos cuenta que sus hermanos son panaderos y ella en sus tiempos libres les ayuda y esto le ha incentivado para soñar en que algún día pueda tener su propia panadería.
texts.en:
María is a young single woman of 24 who lives with her mother, Isabel, who is 65. They live in Andrade Marín parish in Atuntaqui, which is a city of 21,000 inhabitants, located in Imbabura Province in northern Ecuador. Although the proper name of the area is Antonio Ante, those who visit or have heard about it usually call it Atuntaqui.  This area is known for its textile fabrication which represent the majority of the economic movement of the city. Besides their tasty typical food, here they prepare the best fritadas that are made from a base of pig meat and accompanied by products from the area like potatoes and "mote" (a corn-based food). 

This entrepreneur started her own business a year ago, raising and selling cuyes [guinea pigs, raised for meat in some parts of Latin America]. She learned this work from her mother. She provides economically for her humble household. Now she intends to grow her business (since the demand for this animal allows for growth), and for that she needs a loan so she can purchase more cuyes and sell them to increase her earnings. 

Fundación Alternativa, which is the field partner for this loan, offers María training and advice in such a way that her business can grow in a sustainable manner. An interesting aspect of this business is that in Ecuador these animals are sold as food, not as pets as is done in other countries. Despite working at this business full time, María's dream is to have a bakery. She says that her siblings are bakers and in her free time she helps them, and this has given her the incentive to work toward one day having her own bakery.

loans.use: to purchase cuyes [guinea pigs] to raise and sell them

loans.name: Otilia Maria

texts.es:
La joven señora Otilia tiene 22 años de edad, es madre soltera de 1 hijo y se dedica al comercio, su actividad principal es la venta Baleadas (Tortillas de harina con frijoles, huevo, mantequilla, queso y carne) su negocio esta ubicado en un punto muy estratégico, por ese sector transitan muchas personas que se dirigen a los centros educativos y centros de trabajo, ahora en estos momentos sus clientes se han triplicado y no logra cubrir con todas las exigencias de sus clientes.
Otilia utilizara el credito para la compra de alimentos para la preparacion de sus sabrosas baleadas.
las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con su hijo.
texts.en: Otilia, 22, is a young single mother of 1 son, is a businesswoman who sells "baleadas" (flour tortillas with beans, eggs, butter, cheese and meat). Her business is in a very strategic location: many people pass through the area on their way to school or work. At this point, her customers have tripled and she can no longer meet all of their requests. Otilia will use the loan to purchase ingredients for her flavorful "baleadas." She needs the income so she and her son can get ahead.

loans.use: to purchase beans, cheese, butter, eggs, corn flour, lard, oil, condiments, sodas, meats, gas, and disposable plates and cups.

loans.name: Karla Vanessa

texts.es: Karla está en la etapa final de su carrera de Arquitectura. Y está solicitando el crédito para pagar eñ curso de graduación, que tiene una duración de 6 meses. Espera poder independizarse y tener sus  propios logros, también le inspiran sus padres. En un futuro quiere tener su propia constructora o trabajar en proyectos supervisando obras. Quiere demostrar todo lo que puede hacer en el plano profesional.
texts.en: Karla is in the final stage of her program in architecture, and she is requesting the loan to pay for a graduation course, which lasts six months.  She hopes to be able to become independent and have her own achievements.  Her parents also inspire her.  In the future she wants to have her own construction company or work as a project supervisor.  She wants to demonstrate everything she can do on a professional level.

loans.use: to pay for a graduation course.

loans.name: Efrain Miguel

texts.es:
El señor Efrain Miguel es casado, tiene 24 años de edad, cursó el segundo grado de educación primaria, se dedica a la albañilería y a la confección de tejidos, inició este negocio de confección de tejido gracia al apoyo de un familiar,  lleva 4 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa, quien se dedica a los oficios domésticos.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para compra de productos de tienda: aguas gaseosas, jugos, golosinas, lactes, cereales, etc. quiere abrir este negocio para mejorar su condición de vida y la de sus familia, espera tener un negocio prospero.
texts.en:
Efraín Miguel is 24 years old and married.  He finished the second level of elementary school.  He works in construction and making textiles.  He began this textile business thanks to the support of a family member.  He has four years of experience and has the help of his wife, who works in domestic jobs.

He is requesting a loan to use to buy store products: soda, juice, sweets, milk products, grains, etc.  He wants to open this business to improve his and his family's living conditions.  He hopes to have a prosperous business.

loans.use: to buy products to open a store.

loans.name: Angel

texts.es:
El señor Angel es un hombre de 47 años, casado, actualmente se dedica a la venta de algodón en la ciudad de Pisco, Perú. Esta actividad la aprendió gracias a sus padres que con mucho esfuerzo le dejaron como herencia estas hectáreas de terreno y la producción de este producto, el se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 4 años y está muy contento por los avances que viene logrando durante el transcurso de estos meses.

Actualmente desea que los prestatarios Kiva lo ayuden y el pueda comprar los fertilizantes, plaguicidas y huano que es necesario para el desarrollo de las tierras en donde trabaja, él sabe que con mucho esfuerzo, dedicación e inversión él podrá generarse una mejor calidad de vida, mejorar sus ingresos económicos y de este modo su esposa se sienta cómoda y contenta junto a él, también desea poder mejorar el aspecto de su casa, debido a que solo está hecha a base de esteras.
texts.en:
Angel is a 47-year-old married man.  Currently he works selling cotton in the city of Pisco, Peru.  He learned this work thanks to his parents who, with great effort, left him the inheritance of these hectares of land and the production of this crop.  He has worked in this job for four years and is very happy for the progress that he has been making in these months.

Currently he wants the Kiva lenders to help him so he can buy the fertilizer, pesticide, and guano that is necessary to develop the lands where he works.  He knows that with a lot of effort, dedication, and investment he will be able to create for himself a better quality of life and improve his income.  In this way his wife will feel comfortable and content with him.  He also wants to be able to improve the appearance of his house, since it is made only of straw mats.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, pesticide, and guano.

loans.name: Heisy Georgina

texts.es: Heisy está estudiando la carrera de Ingeniería en Sistemas y está solicitando el préstamo para comprar una laptop, que le permita poner en práctica los conocimientos que está adquiriendo en la universidad, así mismo para hacer investigaciones acerca de su carrera. Actualmente se encuentra laborando y es de ésta manera que pagará el crédito y que tambien paga sus estudios. Quiere sacar adelante a su pequeño hijo y a sus padres, es por eso que aspira a un mejor puesto, el que le permita obtener mejores ingresos para lograrlo. Sus papás siempre la han apoyado para que ella pudiera terminar su carrera.
texts.en:
Heisy is studying to be a systems engineer and is asking for this loan to buy a laptop, which will let her put into practice what she is learning at college, and also to do research regarding her career. Right now she is working, and this is how she will pay for the loan and for her studies. 

She would like to give her small son and parents the best in life, which is why she aspires for a good job which would let her make enough money to achieve that. Her parents have always supported her so that she could finish her career.

loans.use: to buy equipment for her engineering practicals.

loans.name: Gloria Consuelo

texts.es:
La señora Gloria tiene 36 años de edad, vive con sus tres hijos y se dedica a la venta de achinería y chocobananos, los chocobananos son minimos congelados bañados de chocolate, a muchas personas le gusta este tipo de golosina, ademas esa zona es muy caliente y con eso se refrescan un poco, tiene mucha experiencia en venta de achineria, sus ventas las realiza en El Salvador,  junto con su esposo viaja de lunes a sábado a realizar sus ventas. sus clientes son personas que se transitan de El Salvador hacia Honduras y viceversa.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de mas productos para tener mayor variedad para sus clientes y así obtener mejores ganancias.

Su meta es tener un buen negocio en su casa.
texts.en:
Gloria is 36 years old. She lives with her three children and peddles small goods and chocobananas. Chocobananas are small frozen bananas bathed in chocolate. Lots of people like this kind of sweet. Moreover, this is a very hot zone and with the chocobananas one is refreshed a bit. She has a lot of experience peddling. She makes her sales in El Salvador. Together with her husband, she travels from Monday to Saturday making her sales. Her customers are people heading from El Salvador towards Honduras or vice versa.
She will use the loan to buy more products in order to have greater variety for her customers and in this way make bigger profits. 
Her goal is to have a good business out of her home.

loans.use: to buy padlocks, chains, light bulbs, batteries, toothpaste, razors, remote controls, bananas and melted chocolate.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es:
