Este comité es de la Ciudad de San Lorenzo,  las integrantes del comité fijaron como objetivo principal el crecimiento de cada una de ellas, no solo en lo económico, sino también en lo personal. Las mismas son reconocidas en el lugar como mujeres muy trabajadoras y luchadoras.
La Sra. Mirtha , presidenta del grupo  está casada, tiene 3 hijos, es una mujer muy emprendedora e innovadora, ella se dedica a la costura desde hace mucho tiempo.  Por medio de los trabajos de costura que ella hace, ha podido ayudar  a su familia a salir adelante. Una de sus metas es poder seguir creciendo y de esa forma seguir mejorando sus condiciones de vida.
Ella pide el crédito para la compra de telas, botones, cierres y demás insumos para poder surtirse y de esa forma poder cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Agradece a la fundación y a Kiva por la oportunidad que estas le dan.
texts.en:
This committee is from the city of San Lorenzo.  The members of the committee set as their main goal the growth of each one of them not only economically but also personally.  They are well known in the community as hardworking, tenacious women.

Mirtha, group President, is married and has three children.  She’s a very enterprising, innovating woman.  She’s been a seamstress for a long time.  Through the sewing jobs she does she’s been able to help her family get ahead.  One of her goals is to continue growing and continue improving her living conditions.

She is asking for the loan to buy fabric, buttons, zippers and other supplies to stock up on and be able to meet customer demand.  She thanks the Fundación and Kiva for the opportunity they give her.

loans.use: to buy fabric, buttons, zippers and other supplies.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
La Srita Sonia es madre soltera vive en la casa de su familia en la ciudad de Caacupé, trabajó casi 10 años en una peluquería y a la vez estudiaba , hace 1 año que se independizó abriendo su propia peluquería en la ciudad de Caacupé , donde ya cuenta con clientela formada.
Comenta que su negocio es muy concurrido pues ella siempre atiende con simpatía y buena onda a todos los clientes y clientas. Una de sus metas es poder seguir creciendo y de esa forma seguir ayudando a su familia por medio de sus trabajo y a la vez poder dar fuentes de trabajo a otras personas.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra tintes, esmaltes para uñas, tijeras, peines y demás insumos necesarios para poder abastecer su negocio y de esa forma poder brindar un buen servicio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Sonia is a single mother living in her family’s house in the city of Caacupé.  He worked for almost ten years in a beauty salon while going to school.  A year ago she became independent and opened her own beauty salon in the city of Caacupé where she has a well-established clientele.

She comments that her business is very well-attended because she treats customers pleasantly and she is charming with both male and female customers.  One of her goals is to continue growing to continue helping her family through her work while at the same time being able to provide employment for other people.

She’s asking for the loan to buy hair color, nail polish, scissors, combs and other supplies needed to stock the business and provide good service to her customers.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Las Orquideas Group

texts.es: La nueva Alcancía Comunal “Las Orquideas” está conformada por 09 socias entusiastas de comenzar a trabajar con el Programa – Prosperidad, escogieron ese  nombre ya que la  mayoría de los integrantes son personas que nacieron en pueblo  donde se cultiva dichas flor. Nilda es la presidenta del grupo, es una mujer joven de  21 años de edad es conviviente y aun no tiene hijos, actualmente cuenta con una bodega instalada en su domicilio, este negocio surgió con la idea de contar con un negocio propio, gracias a su arduo trabajo Nilda ha logrado realizar unas de sus metas, comprar su propio terreno. Con el fin de seguir mejorando solicito el crédito para invertir en su negocio comprando gaseosas, galletas, leche, fideos etc. El sueño de Nilda es terminar de construir su vivienda y así poder ampliar su bodega. La nueva Alcancía Comunal “Las Orquideas” están agradecidos por el crédito brindado.   Nilda es la que viste un polo negro.
texts.en:
The new “Las Orquídas” (Orchids) communal bank has nine members who are enthusiastic about starting to work with Programa-Prosperidad.  They chose that name because most of the members were born in a town where said flowers are grown.  

Nilda is the group President.  She is 21 years old and has a spouse though no children yet.  She has a home-based grocery store that arose from her wish to have a business of her own.  Thanks to her hard work, Nilda has managed to reach one of her goals: to buy her own piece of land.

In order to continue improving, she asked for the loan to invest in the business buying soft-drinks, cookies, milk, noodles, etc.  Nilda’s dream is to finish building her house so that she can expand her store.  

The new “Las Orquídeas” communal bank is grateful for the loan provided.  Nilda is the one wearing a black polo shirt.

loans.use: to buy soft-drinks, cookies,milk and noodles.

loans.name: Kuña Aty Group

texts.es:
El Comité Kuña Aty del programa Comité de Mujeres con un total de 13 mujeres de las cuales son todas amigas, vecinas y hasta parientes. Están en el tercer ciclo,  y comentan que cada una tiene su actividad respectiva, pero también hacen actividades en conjunto para poder fomentar su compañerismo.
Lorenza es una de las integrantes del grupo,  ella nos cuenta que tiene una modesta despensa, gracias a la cual ha podido sacar adelante a su familia  y cubrir los gastos de la casa.  Ella se define como una persona muy trabajadora y emprendedora que siempre se esfuerza al máximo para poder ayudar a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de carnes, verduras, lácteos, bebidas y demás artículos de primera necesidad, con lo cual podrá surtir su negocio.
texts.en:
The “Kuña” committee of the Women’s Committee Program has a total of 13 women who are friends, neighbors and even relatives.  They are in the third cycle and they comment that each one of them has her own activity but they also conduct group activities to foster their companionship.

Lorenza is one of the group members.  She tells us that she has a modest grocery store thanks to which she’s been able to support her family and cover household expenses.  She defines herself as a very hardworking, enterprising person who always makes the maximum effort to be able to help her family.

She’s asking for the loan to buy meats, vegetables, dairy products, beverages and other basic staple items to stock her store.

loans.use: to buy meats, vegetables, dairy products, beverages and other articles.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
La señora Graciela es una mujer de 51 años que tiene 6 hijos, actualmente vive solo con la menor de 11 años, debido  a que todos sus hijas ya son mayores de edad y viven independientemente. Ella es una mujer trabajadora que tiene muchas ganas de superación y hacer de su pequeño hija un bien profesional, como apoyo incondicional se encuentra su esposo que es comerciante en un Restaurant ubicado cerca de la playa de la ciudad de Mala.

Actualmente la señora Graciela trabaja un promedio de 12 horas diarias con la finalidad de generar los ingresos necesarios para el hogar y para poder comprar nuevos y mejores productos, su hija la apoya a diario, Graciela piensa que el motivo principal por el que tiene muchos clientes es el carisma y buen humor que tiene su hija para ayudarla en la tienda de abarrotes que tienen. Este negocio le permite generar un ingreso diario de S/.50, pero si hay mucho más público, ella puede lograr una venta de hasta S/.80, esta ganancia es obtenida porque atiende en promedio a 12 clientes diarios. Y por si no fuera poco ella ayuda a su esposo en la venta del restaurant que tienen solo los fines de semana, este esfuerzo les está permitiendo salir adelante.

Una de las debilidades que afronta actualmente Graciela es que no cuenta con un monto de dinero considerable para por generar la compra al por mayor de algunos abarrotes como  arroz, aceite, azúcar, gaseosas, dulces, etc. es por eso que desea que los prestatarios Kiva puedan ayudarla con un préstamo de S/.1,000.00 y así ella pueda comprar los abarrotes que necesita a un precio muy cómodo. Sabe que si ella hace buen uso del dinero podrá llegar a su meta, la misma que consiste en que su hija continúe estudiando y tener una nueva y mejor bodega.
texts.en:
Graciela is a 51-year-old woman who has six children.  She currently lives just with her youngest 11-year-old because all her other daughters are adults living independently.  She is a hardworking woman who very much wants to get ahead and see her young daughter become a good professional.  Her husband, who is a merchant at a restaurant located near the beach in the city of Mala, gives her unconditional support.

Currently, Graciela works on average 12 hours a day hoping to generate the necessary income for the home and to buy new and better products.  Her daughter helps her every day.  Graciela believes that the main reason why she has so many customers is the charisma and good humor her daughter has while helping her in the grocery store they have.  This business allows her to earn a daily income of 50 soles but if there is a lot of public she can earn up to 80 soles.  This profit is attained because she tends to an average of 12 customers daily.  If that weren’t enough, she helps her husband with the sales in the restaurant which they only have on weekends.  This effort has made it possible for them to get ahead.

One of the weaknesses Graciela faces currently is that she does not have a considerable amount of capital available to be able to buy supplies like rice, oil, sugar, soft-drinks, candy, etc. at wholesale and this is why she’d like Kiva lenders to help her with a loan of 1,000 soles so that she can buy the groceries she needs at a more comfortable price.  She knows that if she makes good use of the money she’ll reach her goal which is that he daughter continues going to school and to have a new and better store.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Margarita Esperanza

texts.es:
La señora Margarita Esperanza  es casada, tiene 26 años de edad, esta titulada como maestra de educación, tiene 2 hijos 1 de los cuales estudia, se dedica a impartir clases a niños y niñas de una escuela, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al mismo trabajo, en la foto aparece junto a su esposo e hijos. 

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para iniciar un negocio de confección de tejidos: camisa y pantalones. Van a comprar telas de gabardina Espera tener un negocio prospero y estable.
texts.en: Margarita Esperanza is married.  She’s 26 years old and is a school teacher.  She has two children one of which attends school.  She teaches classes to boys and girls in a school.  She can count on support from her husband who is also a teacher.  In the photo she appears with her husband and children.  She’s asking for a loan to start a sewing business making shirts and pants.  They will buy gabardine.  She hopes to have a prosperous, stable business.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La Sra Rosa tiene 37 años de edad, está casada con el Sr. Ismael hace ya 20 años de dicho matrimonios de los cuales nacieron 3 hijos.
La Sra Rosa se dedica a la cosecha y siembra de hortalizas y posteriormente ella misma los vende en las ferias. Ella es una señora muy trabajadora y sacrificada, pues todo lo que hace es por darle a su familia todo lo mejor. La Sra Rosa desea ampliar su producción y de esa forma poder darle un mejor estilo de vida a su familia.
Solicito este crédito para la ampliación de su producción de hortalizas y para la compra de mas herramientas y equipos que precisa para producir.
texts.en: Rosa, 37, has been married to Ismael for 20 years and they have three children.  Rosa farms vegetables that she later sells herself in various street markets.  She is a very hardworking, self-sacrificing woman because everything she does is to provide her family with the best.  Rosa wants to expand production to provide her family with a better standard of living.  She requested this loan to expand vegetable production and to buy more tools and supplies needed to do so.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials to make baskets

loans.name: Rosa Orfelina

texts.es:
Rosa es una mujer trabajador que tiene muchas aspiraciones en los años próximos de prosperar en su pequeña tienda ya que tiene una familia conformada de tres hijos y es soltera. 

Comenzó con el negocio vendiendo pequeñas cosas poco a poco comenzó a tener ingresos. Ahora ella trabaja en su tienda.  Tiene muchas aspiraciones por eso quiere continuar su tienda para darle una mejor vida a sus hijos. 

Por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar vivieres para la tienda como arroz, aceites, bebidas, granos etc.
texts.en:
Rosa is a hardworking woman who has many goals in the coming years for her little store to prosper.  She has a family of three children and is single.

She began the business selling little things and little by little began to have income.  Now she works in her store.  She has many goals, so she wants to continue her store to give her children a better life.

This is why she wants the loan to buy supplies for the store such as rice, oil, beverages, grains, etc.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, and beverages.

loans.name: Kuña Katupyry Group

texts.es:
El Comité Kuña Katupyry, se inicio cuando un grupo de señoras se reunieron solidariamente para trabajar en equipo con un solo ideal, que es sobresalir  con su arduo trabajo de día a día.  Es un grupo de 16 señoras humildes y muy trabajadoras, actualmente están en el 10° ciclo y agradecen infinitamente por el apoyo,  los seguimientos constantes, las capacitaciones y por confiar en ellas a otorgarles una ayuda para mejorar la calidad de vida de ellas y sus familias.
Una de las integrantes es la señora Maria, quien se dedica a la venta de prendas de todo tipo. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora. Por medio de su arduo trabajo ella puede solventar el día a día de su familia y mantener a la vez su negocio. Su meta es crecer y seguir ayudando a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de verano, para que de esa forma pueda cumplir con la demanda de sus clientes. Ella agradece a la fundación y a kiva por la oportunidad que esta le da.
texts.en:
The Kuña Katupyry communal bank began when a group of women met jointly to work as a team with a single ideal, which is to stand out day by day with their hard work.  It is a group of 16 modest and hardworking women.  Currently they are in the tenth loan cycle and they are infinitely grateful for the support, the constant monitoring, the training, and for trusting in them to help them improve their quality of life and that of their families.

One of the members is María, who works selling all types of clothing.  She is a very hardworking woman and a fighter.  Through her hard work she is able to pay her family's daily expenses and at the same time support her business.  Her goal is to grow and continue helping her family.

She is requesting the loan to buy summer clothes so she can fulfill her customers' demands.  She is grateful to the foundation and to Kiva for the opportunity they are giving her.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Maria Nilda

texts.es:
La señora Maria tiene 40 años de edad, es madre soltera y tiene tres hijos, dos de ellos ya se graduaron del colegio el año pasado, Maria se dedica a la venta de chocobananos, paletas, golosinas, frescos, churros y tajaditas de platano, realiza este tipo de actividad desde hace mas de 5 años, su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitacion.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de bananos, chocolate liquido, frutas, leche, refrescos y churros. 
las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con sus hijos.
texts.en:
Maria is 40 years old, and is the single mother of 3 children.  Two of her children already graduated from school last year.  Maria has a business selling chocolate bananas, popsicles, candy, soft drinks, churros and fried bananas.  She has been doing this type of work for more than 5 years.  Her business is located in the house where she lives.

She will use this loan to buy bananas, chocolate syrup, fruit, milk, soft drinks and churros.

She needs the earnings from this business in order to provide for her children.

loans.use: to buy bananas, chocolate syrup, fruit, milk, soft drinks and churros.

loans.name: Jorge Jhon

texts.es:
Jorge de 46 años es un hombre trabajador que tiene muchas proyecciones en el futuro para su familia. Por eso comenzó como ebanista para mantener con buenos ingresos a su familia. A pesar que suben los precios de las herramientas con las que trabaja sigue en el negocio. 

Hace toda clase de muebles con la madera que compra al por mayor. Tiene muchas proyecciones para agrandar su negocio pero para ello necesita ingresos. Por ello quiere un préstamo para comprar madera y hacer mas muebles para vender.
texts.en:
Jorge, 46, is a hardworking man who has a lot of plans for the future for his family.  He started out working as a cabinetmaker in order to make good earnings to support his family.  He is continuing in this line of work, in spite of the fact that the price of woodworking tools has increased.

He makes all types of furniture with wood that he buys at wholesale.  He has a lot of plans to expand his business, but in order to do this he needs money.  For this reason he is requesting a loan to buy wood so that he can make more furniture to sell.

loans.use: to buy wood

loans.name: Walter Antonio

texts.es:
Walter es un hombre de 32 años. Es casado con Alexandra de 29 años con quien tiene dos hijos de 2 y de 6 años. Viven en la parroquia de "Abrahan Calazacon" en "Santo Domingo" que es cantón y ciudad de la nueva Provincia de Santo Domingo de los Tsáchilas, que era parroquia rural de Quito (Capital del Ecuador),  Santo Domingo está entre la costa y la sierra del país, punto de enlace entre algunas ciudades importantes. Situado en los flancos externos de la cordillera occidental, así como en la planicie costeña inferior a los 1000 msnm, es la zona de mayor pluviosidad del país. Tiene una gran riqueza hidrológica: existen cinco cuencas y micro cuencas importantes. Es una zona climática lluviosa subtropical, posee una temperatura promedio de 22 °C.

Walter, hace 8 años inicio su negocio de cerrajería; fabrica ventanas y puertas de hierro. Esta actividad la aprendió de su negocio anterior y hoy en día el trabaja junto a su sobrino en esta actividad. Este hombre trabajador tiene un obstáculo por superar ya que la soldadora de metales con la que trabaja falla mucho, haciendo que su trabajo se retrase por lo que necesita de un crédito para poder comprar otra más grande y moderna. Fundación Alternativa, que es la institución que intermediará entre el cliente y los prestamistas a nivel mundial, le brindará a este pequeño empresario, capacitación y asesoramiento para que el pueda crecer sosteniblemente.

Mientras Walter trabaja, su esposa se hace cargo de las tareas del hogar y de la crianza de sus hijos, es por esto que él se preocupa mucho por tener mayores ingresos y dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Walter is 32 years old, married to his wife Alexandra (29) and lives with his two children, ages 2 and 6.  They live in the Abrahan Calazacon parish, located in the new Santo Domingo province of Tsáchitas, which used to be a rural parish of Quito (the capital city of Ecuador). Santo Domingo is located between Ecuador's coastline and sierra regions.  At nearly 3,280 feet in elevation and with an average temperature of 72 degrees, it acts as an access point to other key cities and is situated in the outer edges of the western mountain range in a subtropical coastal zone.  The region has five water basins and accounts for the country's greatest rainfall, making water an abundant resource. 

Walter is a hard worker.  He began working as a metalsmith eight years ago and continues working today alongside his nephew.  While they work, Walter's wife cares for the home and the upbringing of their children.  Walter is very concerned with increasing his income in order to improve his family's quality of life. 

A malfunctioning welder has become an obstacle and has caused him to get behind in his work. Walter plans to use the loan to buy a newer, more modern welder.  Fundación Alternativa, the intermediary organization between the client and international lenders, will administer the micro-loan and offer training and counseling to help Walter's business achieve sustainable growth.

loans.use: purchase a new welder

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase ice cream to sell.

loans.name: Norma Patricia

texts.es:
Norma de 30 años, es una mujer trabajadora que tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio de llamadas. Tiene ya algunos años con su negocio por eso quiere seguir invirtiendo en las llamadas ya que le ha ayudado a mejorar los ingresos de su familia. 

En la actualidad trabaja desde muy temprano atendiendo la central de llamadas para sus clientes.  Quiere con el préstamo poner más centrales telefónicas para tener más clientela ya que en ocasiones se llena el local.
texts.en:
Norma is 30 years old and is a hardworking woman who has many plans for her telephone call center.  She has had this business for a few years and she wants to continue investing in it because it has helped her improve her family’s income.

Norma begins her work very early in the morning attending to her customers at the call center.  She wants to use the loan to install more telephones at the call center so she can have more customers, since there are times when the center is completely full.

loans.use: to install more telephones at her call center.

loans.name: Kenia Elizabeth

texts.es: Kenia es una joven estudiante, cursando la carrera de Arquitectura, está en el último año, y por cursar los módulos para acceder a su título, el préstamo será usado para pagar los módulos de graduación. Sus padres le han apoyado económicamente para que ella pueda finalizar su carrera. Dentro de 5 o 10 años espera formar una mediana empresa , trabajar en diseño de interiores y diseños arquitectónicos y así empezar a mejorar la economía familiar. Le inspiran el deseo de superación de poder mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Kenia is a young student who is pursuing a degree in architecture.  This is her final year, and she needs to take some final course units in order to be eligible for her degree.  She is going to use the loan to pay for the classes that she needs to graduate.  Her parents have supported her financially so she can finish her degree.  Within 5 to 10 years Kenia hopes to establish a medium-sized business specializing in interior design and architectural design, which would begin to improve her family’s economic situation.  Kenia’s parents have inspired her desire to get ahead so she can improve her family’s quality of life.

loans.use: to pay for classes so she can graduate.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es: Mercedes es socia del Banco Comunal Estrella, se dedica a la venta de verduras y frutas en el Distrito de San Juan Bautista, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 5 años y todo este tiempo pudo aprender cosas que le ayudaron en su vida personal como en su negocio, gracias a Finca pudo educar a sus hijos y criarlos de una buena manera, la responsabilidad y la puntualidad son valores que aprendió por la capacitaciones que le brindaron, ahora este préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de frutas y verduras para su negocio.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a member of the Estrella communal bank. She makes a living selling vegetables and fruits in the District of San Juan Bautista. She has been a member of Finca Perú for five years, and during this time she has learned things that have helped her both in her personal life and in her business. 
Thanks to Finca she could educate her children and raise them well. She learned the value of responsibility and punctuality through the training they offered. 

She will put this loan towards the purchase of fruits and vegetables for her business.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Gliceria

texts.es: Gliceria es socia del Banco Comunal Estrella, tiene 47 años, y se dedica a la venta de cereales en la ferias, tiene 10 hijos, es socia de Finca Perú desde hace 12 años, todo este tiempo pudo aprender muchas cosas para poder salir adelante y educar a sus hijos, no fue nada fácil, pero con la facilidad que le dan los prestamos le ayudaron a que su negocio pueda crecer y así sacar adelante a sus hijos, ella esta muy agradecida por la ayuda y las capacitaciones que le dieron, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de cereales para las ferias.
texts.en: Glicera, 47, is a member of the Estrella (star) communal bank and she has been selling grains at the markets for 10 years.  She has also been a member of Finca Perú  for 12 years and in this time she has been able to learn many things to help her get ahead and educate her children.  It hasn’t been easy but she is very grateful for the help that the loans have given her so that her business could grow and  give advantages to her children. She is happy with the help and the training that she has received and she will use the loan to buy grains for the markets.

loans.use: to buy grains to sell at the markets

loans.name: Kuña Aty Joayhu Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre Kuña Aty Joayhu, se conformo en julio del 2010, gracias a la Sra. Nancy quien convenció a algunas compañeras que ya habian formado parte de otro grupo, a formar un nuevo grupo, luego contactaron con la asesora para la conformación del Comité. En estos momentos se encuentran en el  5° ciclo de programa de mujeres emprendedoras.
Nancy nos comenta que se dedica a la venta de prendas variadas, ya que siempre varia las prendas que vende de acuerdo a la estación del clima. por medio de las ventas ella obtiene los medios para ayudar a su familia y darle un estilo de vida decoroso, sin privaciones. Su deseo es poder seguir en su negocio y de esa forma poder seguir ayudando a su familia. Es por ello que pide el crédito, para la compra de prendas de verano, ya que quiere surtirse y tener buena variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.
Agradece a la fundación paraguaya y a kiva por la oportunidad que estas le dan.
texts.en:
The Kuña Aty Joayhu women's communal bank was formed in July 2010 thanks to Nancy, who convinced some friends who were already part of another group to form a new one.  Later they got in touch with the advisor to form the bank.  Currently they are in the fifth cycle of the program for women entrepreneurs.

Nancy tells us that she works selling a variety of clothing, because she always varies the clothes she sells according to the season.  Through the sales she obtains the means to help her family and give them a decent lifestyle without deprivation.  Her desire is to be able to continue with her business and in this way be able to continue helping her family.  This is why she is requesting the loan to buy summer clothes, because she wants to stock up and have a good variety to offer her customers.

She is grateful to Fundación Paraguaya and to Kiva for the opportunity they are giving her.

loans.use: to buy summer clothing to sell.

loans.name: Honorata

texts.es: Honorata es socia del Banco Comunal Ayni, tiene 64 años, se dedica a la venta de ropas en las ferias, es madre de 5 hijos, es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace un año, pero ya puede ver la diferencia que hay con otras entidades, ve que su palta esta segura, le gusta mucho ahorrar, siempre esta de viaje pero trata de estar en la capacitaciones, ahora el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de ropa para las ferias.
texts.en: Honorata is a member of the Ayni communal bank.  She is 64 years old and the mother of five children, and works selling clothing in the markets.  She has been a member of FINCA Perú for a year, but she can already see the difference there is with other institutions.  She sees that her money is safe.  She very much likes to save.  She is always traveling but she tries to be in the training sessions.  She will invest the loan she is now requesting in buying clothes for the markets.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Aarón

texts.es:
El joven Aarón desea reparar el techo de la cocina de su casa ya que están en malas condiciones y cuando llueve se le mojan todos sus muebles. También le preocupa la salud de el y  de su abuelita quien vive con el.
Aarón es empleado de una compañía de limpieza desde hace ya más de dos años y su abuelita le ayuda con las ganancias que obtiene de las ventas de su negocio de ropa usada y nueva en diferentes partes de la ciudad. 
Solicita el préstamo para comprar la madera y pagarle a la persona que se encargara de reparar el techo. Desea mejorar su vivienda y el patrimonio que tiene.
texts.en:
Aarón wants to repair the kitchen ceiling in his home, since it is in very bad condition and whenever it rains his furniture gets wet.  He is also concerned about his health and that of his grandmother, who lives with him.

Aarón has worked for a cleaning company for more than two years.  His grandmother helps him with her earnings from her business selling new and second-hand clothing in different parts of the city.

Aarón is asking for a loan so he can purchase wood and pay someone who will take care of repairing the ceiling.  He wants to improve his home and the assets he has.

loans.use: to repair his ceiling.

loans.name: Delia

texts.es: Delia es socia del Banco Comunal Urubamba, tiene 50 años, vende chicharrón en Huascahura, es madre de 4 hijos, es casada y socia de Finca Perú desde hace 7 años, le encanta todo lo que hacen en Finca ya que todas sus enseñanzas le ayudan a progresar, pudo educar sus hijos de manera correcta, y su negocio pudo crecer, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de chancho y oveja.
texts.en: Delia is a member of the Urubamba communal bank.  She is 50 years old and sells pork rinds in Huascahura.  She is the mother of 4 children, is married, and has worked with Finca Perú for 7 years.  She likes everything that Finca does, since everything it has taught her has helped her make progress.  She was able to bring her children up properly, and her business managed to grow.  She will use the loan to invest in purchasing pigs and sheep.

loans.use: to purchase pigs and sheep.

loans.name: Semilina

texts.es: Semilina es socia del Banco Comunal Urubamba, tiene 44 años, tiene una tienda de ropas en Huaytará, es madre soltera de  una hija, y es socia de Finca Peru desde hace 8 años, comenzó con poco capital y poco a poco fue creciendo, ser madre soltera no es fácil pero ella pudo salir adelante con su hija, las capacitaciones le ayudaron a poder criar bien a sus hija y en la dirección de su negocio, con las capitaciones aprendió la puntualidad y la responsabilidad, ahora con el préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de ropa para su negocio, lo que anhela es poder terminar de construir su casa en Huascahura.
texts.en: Semilina is a member of the Urubamba communal bank.  She is 44 years old, and has a clothing store in Huaytará.  She is a single mother with one daughter, and has worked with Finca Peru for 8 years.  She started out with little capital and gradually her business has grown.  It isn’t easy being a single mother, but Semilina has managed to get ahead with her daughter.  Finca’s training has helped her to raise her daughter well, and has also helped her with her business.  The training has taught her to be punctual and responsible.  Semilina will use the loan to invest in purchasing clothing for her business.  Her wish is that she can finish building her home in Huascahura.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for her business.

loans.name: Virgen De Fatima Group

texts.es:
21 mujeres de ciudad de Itá se han unido con el propósito de ayudarse las unas con las otras por medio del trabajo en conjunto. Ellas ven una gran oportunidad de progreso con el programa de mujeres emprendedoras de la fundación paraguaya y es por ello que decidieron formar el grupo al que llamaron Virgen de Fátima, quienes se encuentran actualmente en el noveno ciclo del programa.
Concepción es una de las integrantes del grupo, ella nos cuenta que siempre ha trabajo desde muy pequeña y que por eso no teme a ningún tipo de trabajo, ni desafíos. Ella cuenta que se dedica a la venta de cosméticos variados, en lo cual le va muy bien, pues ya tiene una clientela bien formada. Su meta es poder seguir creciendo y de esa forma seguir ayudando a su familia.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de cosméticos, con lo cual podrá cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientas y a la vez ofrecerles mayor variedad.
texts.en:
21 women in the city of Itá have joined together with the aim of helping one another by working jointly. They see a great opportunity for progress in Fundación Paraguaya's  program for women entrepreneurs. This is why they decided to form the group that they called "Vírgen de Fatima," which is currently in its ninth loan cycle under the program. 

Concepción is one of the members of the group. She tells us that she has worked since she was very small, and that's why she's not afraid of any kind of work or challenge. She tells us that she sells assorted cosmetics, and that it's going very well, since she has a well-established clientele. Her goal is to be able to continue growing, and that way continue helping her family. 

She is applying for the loan in order to buy cosmetics, so that she will be able to fill her customers' orders, and at the same time offer them greater variety.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics for later sale.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Maria de 62 años tiene una lavandería de ropa en la parte delantera de su casa. Trabaja en ocasiones con su esposo cuando él tiene tiempo libre en su trabajo. También trabaja con sus nietos quienes le ayudan a tender la ropa. 

Tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio ya que le ayuda a su familia en los gastos familiares. Quiere continuar con su lavandería de ropa por eso quiere el préstamo para comprar con el préstamo una lavadora y detergente para tener más ingresos con la fluidez de clientes.
texts.en:
Maria is 62, and has a laundry in the back part of her house. Sometimes she works with her husband when he has free time in his work. She also works with her grandchildren, who help her to hang the clothing. She has many ambitions for her business, as it helps her family with the household expenses.

She wants to continue with her laundry business, and that's why she wants the loan in order to buy a washing machine and detergent. This is so that she can have more income by serving more customers.

loans.use: To buy a washing machine.

loans.name: Adelaida

texts.es: Adelaida es socia del Banco Comunal Urubamba, tiene 43 años, viaja a la Selva llevando verduras, cereales y carne, es madre de 5 hijos, es casada y esta en Finca Perú desde hace 3 años, ella pudo progresar junto con Finca, con la educación de sus hijos, se pudo comprar un terreno con sus ahorros, las capacitaciones le ayudan a poder fijarse metas y poder cumplirlas, ahora con el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de materiales para construir su casa.
texts.en:
Adelaida is a member of the "Urubamba" communal bank. She is 43 years old, married, and the mother of five children. 

She travels to the tropical forest region taking vegetables, cereal grains, and meat to sell.  She has been with Finca Peru for three years. With Finca, she has been able to make progress; educating her children, and being able to buy a piece of land with her savings.

The training helps her to set goals for herself, and to meet them. Now, with the loan she is applying for, she will buy materials for building her house.

loans.use: To buy materials for building her house.

loans.name: Marlin Del Carmen

texts.es:
Marlín  de 44 años, es una mujer trabajadora que tiene un asadero de pollos en la entrada de su casa. Comenzó con el negocio para mejorar sus ingresos. Ahora trabaja desde las 16h00 hasta las 23h00pm. 

Vende pollos asados, con arroz y menestra todos los días. Tiene muchas aspiraciones de continuar con su negocio ya que ayuda a su familia con los gastos familiares. 

Por eso quiere mejorar la fachada de su negocio para darles una mejor presentación a sus clientes. Con el préstamo desea comprar pinturas, sillas, bloques etc.
texts.en:
Marlín is 44, and a hard-working woman who has a chicken grill at the entrance of her house. She started the business to improve her income. Now she works from 4:00pm to 11:00pm. She sells grilled chickens with rice and lentil stew every day.

She has many ambitions for continuing with her business, as it helps the family with the household expenses. That's why she wants to improve the facade of her business, to present a better appearance for her customers. With the loan, she will buy paint, chairs, and cement blocks.

loans.use: To buy paint, chairs, and cement blocks.

loans.name: Aulio Moises

texts.es:
El señor Aulio Moises es casado, tiene 33 años de edad, esta diplomado como contador, tiene 2 hijos los cuales están estudiando, se dedica al comercio a la atención de una tienda en general, inició este negocio por iniciativa propia y hasta el momento lleva 6 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposa, quien se dedica al mismo oficio.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de productos para la tienda que tienen, aguas gaseosas, golosinas, embutidos, cereales, etc. Espera que su negocio sea prospero.
texts.en:
Aulio Moises is 33, married, and a graduate in accounting.  He has two children who are in school.  He has a business running a general store. He started this business through his own initiative, and so far has six years of experience. He has the support of his wife, who has the same occupation.

He is applying for a loan in order to buy products for their store, such as soft drinks, candy, cold cuts, cereal grains, etc. He hopes that his business will prosper.

loans.use: To buy products for his store.

loans.name: Yhon Oscar

texts.es:
Yhon Oscar  tiene 22 años de edad, él vive en Ica, Perú. Ica se encuentra ubicado en el Desierto de Sechura cerca de cuatro horas al sur de Lima, la capital del país, y es aclamado por los peruanos como "La Tierra del Sol". Es conocida en el Perú por sus frecuentes terremotos (un 8,0 en 2007 y 6.9 en 2011), su producción de uvas, espárragos y aceitunas, y tal vez sobre todo, como la fuente de la bebida tradicional del Perú nacional, el Pisco. En este clima cálido y árido se encuentra la casa y empresa del cliente.

"Yhon conduce una mototaxi, se dedica a este trabajo 10 horas diarias, en un día Yhon puede atender a 50 clientes  y esto le permite ganar hasta S/. 40 diarios y en un buen día puede ganar hasta S/.60 lo que le ayuda en algunos gastos adicionales   y para  invertir en el negocio, el cree que le va bien debido a que es cordial con los clientes.

Yhon está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias al apoyo brindado el podrá pagar la inicial de su mototaxi, con esta mejora ya no tendrá que pagar alquiler ya que no contaba con una propia y así poder seguir ahorrando para poder cumplir  su gran sueño: Tener una empresa de mototaxis."
texts.en:
Yhon Oscar is 22, and lives in Ica, Peru. Ica is located in the Sechura Desert, close to four hours south of Lima, the capital of the country. It is celebrated by Peruvians as the "The Land of the Sun."

It is known in Peru for its frequent earthquakes (an 8.0 in 2007, and 6.9 in 2011), its production of grapes, asparagus, and olives, and perhaps especially, as the source of the traditional national drink of Peru, pisco. The home and business of the client is found in this warm and arid climate.

Yhon drives a mototaxi. He works 10 hours a day. In one day, Yhon can serve 50 customers, and this allows him to earn up to 40 soles a day and on a good day, he can earn up to 60 soles. This helps him meet some extra household expenses, and allows him to invest in his business. He thinks that it's going well due to the fact that he is friendly with the customers.

Yhon is very grateful to the Kiva lenders, as thanks to the support he has been offered, he will be able to make the down payment on his mototaxi. With this improvement, he won't have to pay to rent it anymore, as he didn't have is own.  In this way, he will be able to continue saving to fulfill his great dream, "To have a mototaxi company."

loans.use: To make a down payment to purchase his mototaxi.

loans.name: Lourdes Yanina

texts.es:
La señora Lourdes tiene 42 años de edad, esta casada y tiene dos hijos, Lourdes se dedica desde hace 2 años a la venta de golosinas como ser: tacos, enchiladas, tajaditas, yuca, y pastelitos, su negocio esta ubicado en una zona muy transitada, tiene muchos clientes ya que sus golosinas son sabrosas y los precios son muy buenos, ademas esta el trato especial que ella les da a sus clientes.
el credito lo utilizara para comprar los alimentos para la preparacion de sus deliciosas golosinas.
Su sueño es graduar a sus hijos de la universidad.
texts.en:
Lourdes is 42 hers old, is married, and has two children.  Lourdes has been selling treats for two years such as: tacos, enchiladas, fried plantains, yucca, and cakes.  Her business is located in a busy area.  She has many customers since her treats are tasty and the prices are very good.  Besides, she gives her customers special treatment.
She will use the loan to buy ingredients for the preparation of her delicious treats.
Her dream is for her children to graduate from the university.

loans.use: to buy tortillas, yucca, plantains, potatoes, meat, chicken, lard, oil, condiments, cabbage, onions, tomatoes, and limes

loans.name: Claudia Patricia

texts.es: A sus 36 años de edad, la señora Claudia Patricia se dedica desde su pequeña finca ubicada en una vereda del Municipio de Sonsón localizado al oriente de Antioquia al cultivo de tomate de árbol, aguacate, curaba y cebolla desde hace 10 años, dicha actividad la da los frutos para el cuidado y sostenimiento de sus dos hijos de 6 y 14 años de edad. Con el ánimo de reactivar su cultivo de tomate de árbol el cual redujo su producción debido al invierno, la señora Claudia Patricia necesita de la compra de abonos, riegos, fertilizantes e insecticidas con los cuales pueda cumplir su objetivo y así poder mejorar la calidad de vida de sus hijos y cumplir su sueño de  ver su finca bien productiva.
texts.en: At age 36, Claudia Patricia has been cultivating tomato trees, avocados, curaba, and onions for 10 years on her small farm located on a path from the municipality of Sonsón which is located to the east of Antioquia.  This activity gives her the income to care for and sustain her two children who are 6 and 14 years old.  With the intention of reviving her tomato tree crop which reduced its production due to the winter, Claudia Patricia needs to buy fertilizers, hoses, and insecticides.  With these items she will be able to carry out her objective and therefore be able to improve the quality of life of her children and fulfill her dream of seeing her farm being very productive.

loans.use: to buy supplies like fertilizers, hoses, and insecticides

loans.name: Robinson Arley

texts.es: Perseverancia es la palabra con la que mejor se describe a Robinson Arley, un hombre que a sus 36 años, ha trabajado todo lo necesario para sostener a sus 3 hijos y pareja. Robinson es conocido en toda su región por ser una persona muy trabajadora, y gracias a esta reputación se ha podido ganar el cariño de todos sus clientes y fidelizarlos a sus ventas. Robinson se dedica a la producción agropecuaria, posee unos cuantos ganados para la venta y adicionalmente se genera ingresos extras trabajando esporádicamente en la venta de celulares. Con el ánimo de incrementar la venta de su ganado, Robinson requiere un préstamo para la compra de dos terneros para criarlos y luego venderlos a sus compradores, y poder así generar los ingresos que necesita para sostener su hogar. Robinson sueña que con el incremento de sus ventas, pueda comprar un lote propio y tener donde criar a mas ganado y animales de otras especies como gallinas, marranos para su comercialización, y poder así, brindarles la mejor educación posible a sus 3 hijos y una estabilidad económica mayor a la actual.
texts.en: Perseverance is the word which best describes Robinson Arley, a man who is 36 years old.  He has worked as much as necessary to sustain his 3 children and partner.  Robinson is known throughout his region for being a very hardworking person.  Thanks to this reputation, he has been able to gain the affection of his customers and cultivate their loyalty to his sales.  Robinson works in agricultural production.  He has quite a few cattle for sale and additionally makes extra income working sporadically in cellular phone sales.  With the intention of increasing the sale of his cattle, Robinson is requesting a loan to buy two calves in order to raise them and later sell them to his buyers, and to be able to generate the income that he needs to sustain his home.  Robinson dreams that with the increase of his sales, he will be able to buy a plot of land of his own and have a place to raise more cattle and animals of other species like chickens and pigs for commercialization.  This way, he will be able to offer the best education possible to his 3 children and an income that is more stable than right now.

loans.use: to buy two calves

loans.name: Ada Maritza

texts.es:
La señora Ada tiene 35 años de edad y se dedica a la comercializacion de ropa nueva y calzado en su casa de habitacion, todos los dias abre du negocio y sus ventas las hace con amigos y vecinos que le piden por encargo sus productos, en ocaciones vende cosmeticos. tiene 3 años de haber inciado su negocio.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de ropa, tiene varios pedidos y no tiene el capital suficiente para adquirir esta mercaderia.
Su sueño es que su familia tenga paz y salud.
texts.en:
Ada is 35 years old and she sells new clothes and shoes from her home for a living.  Her business is open every day and she sells to her friends and neighbors, who order products from her.  Sometimes she sells cosmetics.  She started her business three years ago.

She will use this loan to buy clothing; she has several orders pending, but she doesn't have enough capital to purchase the merchandise. 

Her dream is for her family to be comfortable and healthy.

loans.use: to buy new women's and men's clothing

loans.name: Luz Estella

texts.es: A sus 56 años, la señora Luz Estella es madre de tres hijos de 16, 13, 11 años de edad, por quienes trabaja día a día con el ánimo de brindarles una buena calidad de vida, dedicándose a la venta de productos de belleza y cuidado personal por catalogo desde hace dos años a sus familiares, vecinos y amigos. Gracias a esta actividad puede generar los ingresos necesarios para colaborar con los gastos de su hogar. La señora Luz Estela necesita de la compra de surtido en dichos productos los cuales pueda ofrecer a sus clientes y poder mejorar sus ingresos, calidad de vida y a futuro cumplir su sueño de tener su propio almacén.
texts.en: At 56 years old, Luz Estella is the mother of three children who are 16, 13, and 11 years old and for whose sake she works day after day in hopes of offering them a good quality of life.  For two years now, she has sold beauty and personal care products through catalogs to her family, neighbors, and friends.  Thanks to this business she is able to generate the income she needs to cover her household expenses.  Luz Estella needs to stock up on those products so she can offer them to her customers and be able to improve her income, her quality of life, and in the future to achieve her dream of having her own store.

loans.use: to stock up on creams, body lotions, perfumes, and beauty products

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
La señora Carmen tiene 65 años de edad, vive en el barrio San Antonio con sus dos nietos y se dedica a la produccion y venta de tortillas, tiene mas de 3 años de dedicarse a este tipo de actividad, sus clientes le visitan a su casa para comprar las tortillas, no sale a vender por su edad,  ya no puede andar caminando bajo el sol, pero muchos clientes la prefieren porque sus tortillas son grandes y sabrosas.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de maiz, leña, cal y agua.
Su meta es poder tener una pulperia fuerte en su casa.
texts.en:
Carmen is 65 years old and lives in the neighborhood of San Antonio with her two grandchildren.  She makes and sells tortillas for a living, which she has been doing for more than three years.  Her customers come to her house to buy her tortillas; she doesn't go out to sell them because of her age.  She can't go walking around in the sun anymore, but many of her customers prefer her because her tortillas are big and tasty.

She will use her loan to buy corn, firewood, lime, and water.

Her goal is to have a solid grocery store in her home.

loans.use: to buy corn, lime, water, and firewood

loans.name: Leonicia

texts.es:
La señora Leonicia tiene 55 años de edad, es madre soltera y vive con su nieto, Leonicia se dedica desde hace 11 años a la venta de tortillas y hace unos años se dedica a la venta de abarroteria, lacteos, embutidos, refrescos, churros y otros productos de la canasta basica familiar. su negocio esta ubicado en su casa de habitacion y todos los dias se levanta bien temprano para atender a sus clientes.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de abarroteria, lacteos, embutidos, granos basicos, refrescos, jugos y pan, desea surtir su negocio.
Su sueño es que sus hijos que tiene en los estados unidos siempre tengan trabajo y esten bien de salud.
texts.en:
Leonicia is 55, a single mother, and lives with her grandson. Leonicia has been selling tortillas for 11 years, and for few years, has been selling groceries, dairy products, cold cuts, soft drinks, churros (a fried dough treat), and other basic household items. 

Her business is located in her home, and she gets up quite early every day to serve her customers. She will use the loan to buy groceries, dairy products, cold cuts, staple grains, soft drinks, juices, and bread, as she wishes to stock her business. 

Her dream is that the children she has in the United States always have work, and be in good health.

loans.use: To buy groceries, dairy products, cold cuts, staple grains, soft drinks, juices, and bread.

loans.name: Señor De Huanca Group

texts.es:
La señora Aydee nació en la ciudad del Cusco y vive en la misma ciudad donde nació. (En la fotografía la señora Aydee está levantando la mano). 

Es la segunda veces que visitamos al banco comunal y encontramos a las mismas personas pero invitaron a una persona ósea de lo que eran 12 socios ahora son 13 socios. La mayoría de los socios siguen dedicándose a los mismos negocios como por ejemplo venta de animales menores como cuyes, venta de comida, venta de  abarrotes, venta de tejidos y venta de miel. Ya son varios años que los socios solicitan préstamos de la Asociación Arariwa y les va muy bien gracias a los pagos puntuales realizan los socios.

En esta oportunidad volvimos a entrevistar a la socia Aydee que se dedica a la brindar servicios de lavandería pero adicionalmente ahora se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir.

Aydee requiere en esta oportunidad el crédito para hacer mantenimiento de las maquinas lavadoras y para comprar materiales de trabajo como por ejemplo detergentes, blanqueadores, perfumes y otras cosas más.

La mayoría de los socios viven en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realizan sus actividades económicas. Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.

(Dos de los socios faltaron a la reunión y la junta directiva les concedió permiso).
texts.en:
Aydee was born in the city of Cusco and lives in the same city where she was born. (In the photograph, Aydee is raising her hand.)

This is the second time we are visiting the community bank and are finding the same people but they invited another person so what was 12 people is now 13 members. The majority of the members continue to dedicate themselves to the same businesses, for example, selling young animals like guinea pigs, selling food, selling groceries, selling weaving and selling honey. For many years the members have requested loans from Arariwa Association and it has been going well thanks to the punctual payments that the members make.

At this time, we return to interview Aydee who is dedicated to providing laundry services but additionally now she is dedicated to selling clothing.

Aydee needs, at this time, the loan to maintain the washing machines and to buy materials for her work like detergents, bleach, perfumes, and other items.

The majority of the members live in the city of Cusco where they perform their jobs. Cusco is known for being a very touristy and commercial area, for its traditional festivity, Inti Raymi, and because you can find one of the seven wonders of the world, Machupicchu.

loans.use: to purchase detergent, bleach, perfumes, and others

loans.name: Maria Emilia

texts.es:
María Emilia, tiene 50 años de edad, tiene 3 hijos mayores de edad entre 23 a 28 años, casada, vive en Cofradia, Cortes.
Doña María, quiere inspirar y proveer a la gente el arte de costurar, hace 11 años estableció su taller propio de costura, elabora ropa de vestir, ropa de cama, forros de muebles, cortinas y otros. Adquirió gran experiencia durante el trabajo que desempeño en una maquila. Ha obtenido nueve préstamos de ODEF, los que han invertido y ha logrado obtener buenas ganancias. Este préstamo actual es de L.15,000.00 y lo utilizara para comprar materiales para elaborar la ropa. Su plan es seguir creciendo en su negocio para mejorar el nivel de vida y ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
María Emilia, age 50, has three grown children between the ages of 23 and 28.  She is married, and she lives in Cofradia, Cortes.

María wants to inspire people and provide them with the art of sewing.  Eleven years ago she set up her own seamstress shop.  She makes clothes, bed linens, slipcovers, curtains, and others.  She acquired great experience when she worked at a factory.

She has received nine loans from ODEF, which she has invested in her business.  She has managed to get good income.

She will use this current loan for 15,000 lempiras to buy materials to make clothes.  Her plan is to continue growing in her business in order to improve her standard of living and to help her family.

loans.use: invest in raw materials for her seamstress shop where she makes bedding, clothes, curtains, and slipcovers to sell.

loans.name: Sandra Yamileth

texts.es:
La señora Sandra tiene 35 años de edad, vive en la colonia Obrera y se dedica a la produccion y venta de tortillas desde hace 10 años, en estos momentos inicio la venta de refrescos de cola helados en diferentes tamaños y sabores, muchas personas compran dicho producto ya que esta zona es muy caliente y los refrescos helados se venden muy bien.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de refrescos, desea tener mas inventario ya que los camiones que reparten dicho producto solo pasan una vez por semana.

las ganancias las necesita para salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Sandra is 35 years old. She lives in the suburb of Obrera and has been dedicated to the production and sale of tortillas for ten years. At this time, she has started selling cold cola refreshments in different sizes and flavors. Many people buy said product since this area is very hot and the cold refreshments sell very well.

The loan will be used to purchase the drinks. She wishes to have more inventory since the trucks that bring the product only come through once a week.

She needs the income in order to get her family ahead.

loans.use: to purchase refreshments in various sizes.

loans.name: Virgen De Los Angeles De Huayllacocha Group

texts.es:
La señora Julia nació en la ciudad de Lucre de la provincia del Quispicanchis departamento del Cusco pero vive en la  comunidad de Huayllacocha. Ya son 13 años que vive en la comunidad pues le gusta el paisaje y se lleva muy bien con sus vecinos. (En la fotografía la señora Julia está levantando la mano). Julia tiene 39 años edad, está casada y fruto de esta unión tiene tres hijos (Elizabeth de 11 años, Sayda de 10 años y Edson de 7 años). Julia es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia y aparte de ser ama de casa también se dedica a la agricultura. En esta oportunidad Julia requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas, abono, fertilizantes y maíz. Ella también se dedica a la crianza de animales como chanchos, cuyes, ovejas entonces una parte del crédito lo utilizara para mejor su ganadería.       

La mayoría de los socias viven en la ciudad de Huayllacocha donde realza todo tipo de actividades como el comercio, agricultura, ganadería y otras actividades. Las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la comunidad de Huayllacocha de la provincia de Anta del departamento del Cusco. Desde la ciudad del Cusco a nuestro destino hay una distancia de 45 Km. (aproximado dos horas de viaje) hasta llegar a la localidad de Huayllacocha. Durante el viaje cruzaremos parte de la cordillera andina Peruana, observaremos hermosos paisajes  interandinos y comunidades indígenas andinas quechuas.
texts.en:
Julia was born in the city of Lucre in the province of Quispicanchis in the department of Cusco, but she lives in the Huayllacocha community.  She has lived there for the last 13 years, as she likes the countryside and gets on well with her neighbors.  (In the photo, Julia is the one with her hand raised.) Julia is 39 years old, married, and has three children (Elizabeth, 11, Sayda, 10, and Edson, 7).  She is an enterprising and hardworking woman who, in addition to being a housewife, also works on the farm.  At the moment, Julia needs a loan to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer, and corn.  She also raises animals, such as pigs, guinea pigs, and sheep; a part of the loan will be used to improve her livestock.

Most of the members of the Virgen de Los Angeles de Huayllacocha group live in Huayllacocha, where they engage in all kinds of activities, such as trading, farming, and ranching, among other things.  The members of the communal bank meet every 30 days in the Huayllacocha community, which is in the Anta province of the department of Cusco.  It is 45 km from Cusco to Huayllacocha (a trip of about two hours). On the way, you cross part of the Peruvian Andean mountain ridge, with its beautiful landscape and communities of Quechua people.

loans.use: to buy seeds, manure, fertilizer and corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy an "overlook" machine since this will optimize resources and improve the quality of her product.

loans.name: Mirna Jannette

texts.es:
Mirna Jannette, de 48 años de edad, casada desde hace 22 años, su esposo es mecánico industrial, tiene 2 hijos de 12 y 19 años de edad, vive en Cofradia, Cortes.
Doña Mirna muy trabajadora, tiene 15 años de dedicarse a vender productos Helados como ice crean, conos, paletas y otros. su producto tiene bastante demanda, todo este tiempo ha logrado obtener los ingresos que necesita en el hogar. Vende desde las 10:00 a.m hasta las 10.00 p.m. ha solicitado este préstamo de L.5,000.00 para invertir en productos que no tenia, como paletas y ice crean en panitas.
Ella esta contenta por el financiamiento ya que con esto va incrementar sus ventas
texts.en: Mirna Jannette, 48, has been married for 22 years; her husband’s an industrial mechanic and she has two children who are 12 and 19 years old.  She lives in Cofradía, Cortes.  Mirna is very hardworking.  She’s been selling frozen treats like ice-cream, ice-cream cones, popsicles and others for fifteen years; her products are in very high demand.  During all this time she’s managed to obtain the income she needs for her home.  She sells from 10am until 10pm and has asked for this L.5,000.00 loan to invest in products she needs like popsicles and ice-cream cups.  She is happy about the loan because this will help her increase sales.

loans.use: to stock up on frozen treats.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis es un luchador, el vive en la ciudad	de Camaná, Perú, un oasis en el otro modo de largo y seco desierto de Sechura que domina la costa en la parte sudoeste del país. Camaná ha sido históricamente un importante destino turístico en el Perú, sin embargo, los frecuentes y fuertes terremotos y tsunamis en la última década (un 8,4 en 2001 y 8,0 en 2007) diezmó la ciudad, destruido la industria del turismo en Camaná, y costando muchos de sus puestos de trabajo, los medios de subsistencia, y los hogares, asimismo Camaná tienen unas hermosas playas ya que solo mirarlas uno se enamoraría  y les gustaría vivir allí; como el Perú es muy conocido por su exquisita gastronomía y uno de los platillos que más le gusta a Luis es el riquísimo “Lomo Saltado”, Luis solo estudio hasta el quinto año de secundario por diversos problemas económicos de sus padres, pero le hubiera gustado estudiar gastronomía ya que a el le encanta cocinar, nos comenta que le gusta comprar libros de cocina para aprender recetas nuevas.

Luis trabaja en su negocio de elaboración y venta de kekes (tortas pequeñas), se levanta muy temprano, desde las 3 de la mañana el esta preparando sus productos porque el dice al que madruga Dios lo ayuda, aproximadamente le dedica a su negocio 8 horas, en un día puede ganar hasta S/.50 pero en un día muy bueno puede ganar hasta S/. 80, el cree que le va bien en su negocio porque cada dia se esfuerza mucho por elaborar bien sus productos y porque sus clientes se sienten a gusto con su labor.

Luis agradece mucho a los prestatarios Kiva porque con su gran apoyo el podrá comprar más utensilios para la elaboración de sus productos con esta mejora el podrá tener mayores ingresos lo que le permitirá seguir ahorrando para que más adelante puede cumplir uno de sus grandes sueños:”comprar un local para la venta de sus productos”
texts.en:
Luis is a fighter. He lives in the city of Camana, Peru, an oasis in the otherwise long and dry Sechura desert that dominates the coast in the southeast part of the country. Camana has historically been an important tourist destination in Peru; nevertheless, the frequent and strong earthquakes and tsunamis in the last decade (an 8.4 in 2001 and an 8.0 in 2007) decimated the city, destroyed the tourist industry of Camana and cost many their jobs, means to make a living and homes. Camana has beautiful beaches that you only have to see to love and you would like to live there. Like Peru, it is well-known for its exquisite gastronomy and one of Luis' favorite dishes is the delicious "Lomo Saltado". Luis only completed fifth year of high school due to his parents' different economic problems, but he would have liked to go to culinary school since he loves to cook. He tells us that he likes to buy cook books to learn new recipes.

Luis works in his business making and selling cakes. He gets up very early. From 3 in the morning he prepares his products because he says that God helps him in the morning. He works for approximately eight hours. In one day, he can earn up to S. 50 but on a good day he can earn up to S.80. He believes his business is going well because every day he works hard to make his products and because his customers are happy with his work.

Luis is very thankful for the Kiva loans because with its great support he can buy more utensils for making his products. With this improvement he will be able to have more income which will permit him to continue saving so that in the future he can accomplish one of his great dreams: to buy a shop from which to sell his products.

loans.use: to buy baking utensils.

loans.name: Rufino

texts.es: Rufino, de 24 años,  convive con  Catita de 21 años padres de 02 hijos, quienes son la felicidad de su hogar y viven en su propia casa en la comunidad de Camunachari. Rufino, es un hombre de mucho provecho, se dedica con mucho esmero a la labor que realiza. Su trabajo es labrar la tierra, es campesino, y desde entonces se dedica cultivar cacao por más de 15 años, lo que ha convertido en un gran conocedor de esta actividad. Él en tiempos de cosecha busca el apoyo de los jornaleros para que le apoyen en las extracciones de los frutos; su planta más rentable es el grano de cacao, por lo cual las empresas acopiadoras de cuyos productos le remuneran muy bien por cada kilogramo. El problema de su trabajo radica en no poder combatir con los insectos quienes se encargan de dañar los frutos de las plantas. El crédito solicitado es para la adquisición de más plantas de cacao para luego injertarlos y sacar buen provecho de sus frutos en menor tiempo. Pero ahora lo que más prioriza es comprar nuevas tierras para expandir sus sembríos y aumentar su producción. Este será su crédito número 01 con MFP, está dispuesto a pagar todas sus cuotas puntualmente, ya que desea acceder a otro crédito más adelante. En su banco comunal es un socio muy participe. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles, comprará más plantones de cacao para luego injertarlos y sacar buen provecho de sus frutos en menor tiempo.
texts.en: Rufino, 24 years old, lives with Catita who is 21. They are parents to two children who are the happiness of the household and they live in their own house in the community of Camunachari. Rufino is a man of great benefit. He is dedicated with great care to the work that he does. His job is to work the land. He is a country person and he has been dedicated to farming cocoa for more than 15 years, which has turned him into an expert in this activity. At harvest time, he looks for support from laborers so they can help with digging up the fruits. His most profitable plant is the cocoa bean for which companies that forage those products pay him well for each kilogram. The problem with his work lies in not being able to combat the insects that damage the plants' fruits. The loan requested is to acquire more cocoa plants to then plant them and make good use of the fruit in less time. But now, what he has prioritized is to buy new land to expand his planting and expand his production. This will be his first loan with MFP.  He is willing to pay all of his repayments punctually since he wishes to take another loan in the future. In his community bank, he is a member who is very involved. With the 1,500 "soles", he will buy more cocoa plants to plant and and make good use of the fruit in less time.

loans.use: to buy cocoa plants.

loans.name: Mack

texts.en:
Mack is the owner of "Dollar King", a neighborhood retail store where every item is sold for only $1.  After Mack retired from the merchant marine industry, he and his daughter, who had a plethora of retail experience, opened Dollar King in May 2011. Dollar King, which employs three people, has experienced substantial growth since it is able to draw business from a neighboring Winn Dixie that acts as its anchor store.  Mack’s future aspirations for his business are to purchase more inventory and have better advertising. 

Mack is very grateful for this Kiva loan, since it is difficult to obtain financing for a start-up business.  Mack will use his Kiva loan to re-shelve the store to create more space to purchase and sell a larger variety of products that will cater to his customers.

loans.use: to purchase more inventory

loans.name: Claudia Marisol

texts.es:
Claudia Marisol tiene 31 años de edad, casada, tiene 3 hijos de 15, 10 y 8 años de edad, los 3 estudian, vive en la Colonia las Torres de Choloma, Cortes. Su esposo trabaja en una maquila como operario.
Claudia inicio su propio negocio con la ayuda de su hermana hace año y medio, es una persona responsable y muy trabajadora.  Ella elabora y vende tortillas de maíz desde las 6:00 a 10:00 de la mañana y de 1:00 a 6:00 de la tarde todos los días. El negocio ha crecido en clientes. Y para mantenerlo a solicitado 3 prestamos con el actual y los ha invertido en materia prima como harina de maíz para elaborar las tortillas. De este préstamo actual va destinar una parte para reparación del techo de su casa. Su meta es que sus hijos terminen los estudios y mejorar la vivienda.
texts.en:
Claudia Marisol, 31, is married and has three children who are 15, 10 and 8 years old; all three attend school.  She lives in the Las Torres neighborhood in Choloma, Cortes.  Her husband is employed at an assembly plant.

Claudia started her own business with help from her sister a year and a half ago.  She is a responsible, very hardworking person.  She makes corn tortillas to sell from 6am until 10am and then from 1pm until 6pm every day.  The business’ clientele has grown.

To stay in business she’s asked for three loans that she’s invested in the purchase of raw materials like corn flour to make tortillas.  With this current loan, she will use part of it to repair her roof.  Her goal is that her children complete their schooling and to improve her house.

loans.use: to buy corn flour and to repair her roof.

loans.name: Reynaldo

texts.en:
Reynaldo is 40 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is separated with 3 children. 
Reynaldo is providing motorela or motorcycle services. He has had this business for 10 years. He requested a loan for PHP 7,000 to buy tools & pay for gasoline for his business.
Reynaldo has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Reynaldo hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy tools & pay for gasoline for his business

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en:
Rosalinda is 46 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with 10 children. 
Rosalinda has a garden & flower shop that sells a variety of flowers like dancing lady (orchids) & roses. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for PHP 8,000 to buy fertilizers for her flower garden.
Rosalinda has been a member of HSPFI since 2009. In the future, Rosalinda hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for her flower garden

loans.name: Dulcenia

texts.en:
Dulcenia is 60 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is widowed with one child. 
Dulcenia has a shop that sells coconuts & bananas. She has had this business for 15 years. She requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy coconuts & bananas for sale.
Dulcenia has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Dulcenia hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy coconuts & bananas for sale

loans.name: Jacinto

texts.en:
Jacinto is 52 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 3 children. 
Jacinto has a shop or sari-sari store that sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. He has had this business for 10 years. He requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages .
Jacinto has been a member of HSPFI since 2009. In the future, Jacinto hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages

loans.name: Noemie

texts.en:
Noemie is 30 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 3 children. 
Noemie has a shop that sells bananas & coconuts. He has had this business for 5 years. He requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to buy coconuts & bananas for sell.
Noemie has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Noemie hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy coconuts & bananas for sale

loans.name: Apolinario

texts.en: Apolinario, 31 years old, lives in the Philippines. He is married with two children. Apolinario is providing motorela [a motorcycle encased in a carriage with two rows of seats facing each other], or motorcycle, services. He has had this business for five years. He requested a loan of 5,000 Philippine pesos to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for the services. Apolinario is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Apolinario hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for the gasoline for a motorela service

loans.name: Larry

texts.en:
Larry is 29 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with 2 children. 

Larry is providing motorela or motorcycle services. He has had this business for 5 years. He requested a loan for 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy tools & pay for the gasoline for his services.

Larry is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Larry hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy tools & pay for the gasoline for his services.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is 35 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married. 

Nenita has a retail shop that sells vegetables like string beans and sayote, as well as spices and coconut wines. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy vegetables, spices & coconut wines to sell.

Nenita is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Nenita hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, spices & coconut wines to sell

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is 42 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with seven children.
 
Imelda has a food shop or sari-sari store that sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for ten years. She requested a loan for 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Imelda a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Imelda hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

loans.name: Jescel

texts.en:
Jescel is 38 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with eight children. 

Jescel has a retail shop that sells different sizes of lumber in many kinds of wood. She has had this business for ten years. She requested a loan for 4,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy stocks of timber & lumber for sale.

Jescel is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Jescel hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy stocks of timber & lumber for sale.

loans.name: Florencio

texts.en:
Florencio is a 49 year old married man from Trinidad, Bohol. Florencio is a farmer and grows rice crops to sell. Florencio earns about 6000 Philippine pesos (PHP) per month from his farming. He works hard to improve his income and sustain his family, especially his children's education.

Florencio has requested this loan to purchase fertilizers, insecticides and other farming materials. In the future, Florencio hopes to have his own money for capital so he will not need to borrow.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, insecticides and other farming materials.

loans.name: Lucena

texts.en:
Lucena is a 47-year-old married woman with 7 children. Her children are aged between 12 and 27 years old. Lucena's husband works as a fisherman.

Lucena owns and manages a sari-sari store in Trinidad, Bohol. She sells items like eggs, soap, shampoo, cooking oil, vinegar and canned goods. Lucena also sells vegetables to her community. She earns about 5000 Philippine pesos (PHP) per month from this business.

Lucena has requested this loan to buy more items to sell such as vegetables, canned goods and eggs. She hopes this loan will help improve her business.

loans.use: to buy more items to sell such as vegetables, canned goods and eggs.

loans.name: Nemesio

texts.en:
55-year-old Nemesio is a fisherman from Trinidad, Bohol. He is married with 2 young children.

Nemesio has been a fisherman for 12 years. He works hard to earn money and sustain his family. Nemesio is also saving for his children's future education. He said he wants his children to be given proper education and to be successful in their chosen fields.

Nemesio requested this loan to buy fishing nets, hooks and other materials. Nemesio hopes to expand his fishing business in the future.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, hooks and other materials.

loans.name: Virgilia

texts.en:
31-year-old Virgilia is a farmer from the town of Trinidad, Bohol. She is married with 3 children aged 11, 8 and 2. Virgilia's husband is also a farmer.

Virgilia helps her husband till their land and plant rice crops on it. She works hard to keep their farm free of weeds and pests. Virgilia also makes sure her children are fed and are healthy.

Virgilia has requested this loan to purchase fertilizers, seeds and other farming materials. Virgilia hopes that through their farming business, their living conditions will improve. She also hopes for her children to be able to go to college and have bright futures.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, seeds and other farming materials.

loans.name: Shirley

texts.en:
Shirley is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a carinderia (local eatery) business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing 14,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Shirley has been in this business for ten years. Shirley earns additional income from selling used clothing.

Shirley has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en:
Vilma works hard to support her family. She is married and has a furniture-making business in the Philippines.

Vilma requested a loan for 15000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy lumber and equipment for her furniture-making business.

She has been in this business for seven years.

Vilma would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy lumber and equipment for her furniture-making business.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.en:
Wilma is 42 years old, married and has three children. With one child in school, Wilma works very hard to provide for them.

Wilma runs a sari-sari store in the Philippines and requested a loan for 19000 Philippine pesos (PHP) through NWTF to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell in her store.

Wilma has been in this business for ten years and sells a variety of items such as shampoo, snacks and other groceries. 

In the future Wilma would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items like shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell in her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Aizada

texts.ru: Айзаде 30 лет, замужем. Вместе с мужем воспитывает троих детей, младшей из которых четыре года. Закончив факультет филологии, Айзада начала работать в школе села Жан-Булак, где и работает по сей день преподавателем английского языка. В 2003 году, в поисках дополнительного источника финансирования для своей семьи, Айзада начала заниматься животноводством. Начатое с суммы в 15,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство сегодня приносит около 15,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молочных продуктов. На сегодняшний день, в ее хозяйстве насчитывается 4 дойные коровы, 20 голов овец, 8 голов коз и 4 лошади.
